	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/07/21/turkey-the-final-episode/" title="Permalink to Turkey: The final&nbsp;episode" rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			July 21, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/07/21/turkey-the-final-episode/#comments">1 Comment</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/07/21/turkey-the-final-episode/" rel="bookmark">Turkey: The final&nbsp;episode</a>
				</h1>

		
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<p>I did exactly what I swore I wouldn&#8217;t do!!  This post should&#8217;ve been written in Turkey, amidst the moments as they happened, but now I&#8217;m back.  I&#8217;m learning that it&#8217;s easy to just jump right back into your life, making all the adventures seem like a bizarre dream&#8230; I&#8217;ve been trying to think about them and look at photos often, and hopefully haven&#8217;t been too obnoxious about it when chatting with friends (old and new&#8230; more on that later). Here are a few stories from Turkey, glad to have a reason to tell them again, after over a month since coming back!</p>
<p>I spent the last 3 weeks of the whole 8 month trip in Western Turkey, and took the time to squeeze out all the excitement I could. I split the time roughly in to two parts:  I took the first 10 days or so to ride a motorbike out of Istanbul and around the Troad coast, passing along the Sea of Marmara, the Dardanelles, and the ancient city of Troy.  After returning to Istanbul, I was so lucky to have a visit from Cora who was just starting her own solo travel adventure through Europe.  We had an awesome time, and she left just in time to miss a stroll through some tear gas on Istiklal street during a demonstration.</p>
<p>Here is a giant album from the motorbike tour&#8230; decided to ditch the bicycle at a hotel for awhile and try out a slightly faster set of wheels.  So. Fun.  I&#8217;m glad I did too, because I wouldn&#8217;t&#8217;ve had been able to make the whole loop had I gone on a bike (and the wind was crazy at times!).  For the route, I used <a title="this" href="http://wikitravel.org/en/Along_the_Troad_Coast" target="_blank">this</a> for inspiration, and ended up passing through the following places: Istanbul to Bandirma (by ferry), Bandirma to Gönen, Gönen to Biga, Biga to Çanakkale (via an out-and-back visit to Gallipoli), Çanakkale to Bozcaada Island (by ferry, after a visit to Troy), Bozcaada to Babakale (westernmost point in Turkey!), Babakale to Asos, Asos to Akçay, Akçay back to Bandirma, and then back to Istanbul by ferry. You can see the route <a title="here" href="https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike" target="_blank">here</a>, just zoom in to Turkey.  I took about 10 days to do this, and along the way I had cherries by the roadside, made a 75-year old friend on a nearly-deserted island, helped someone reconnect with an old friend via Skype, and ate as much baklava and turkish delight as I could take.</p>

height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Out on the south side of the Sea of Marmara, the terrain started out really flat and windy&#8230; saw tons of these wind generators. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1387" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1387" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610301.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161030.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610301.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610301.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610301.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161030.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Street cats. This was one really unique thing about turkey&#8230; almost no street dogs, but tons of (very healthy-looking) cats. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1388" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1388" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610302.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161030.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610302.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610302.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061610302.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161030.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After learning that &#8220;Pansiyon&#8221; means about the equivalent of &#8220;hostel&#8221; in turkey, I had a ton of fun meeting new folks and staying on budget. This was Arda Pansiyon in Biga&#8230; Arda is the 15-yr old on the couch, and his mom is sitting next to me. The place as fantastic and they were really fun. Google translate did an amazing job helping with communication in Turkish (unlike in Vietnamese&#8230;). </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1389" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1389" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161150.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161150.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161150.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pretty view from the motorbike&#8230; it was cool to see Minarets poking up out of the hillsides. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1390" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1390" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611501.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611501.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611501.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611501.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> RRRRRrrrrrtt!!! Couldn&#8217;t pass this by&#8230; lucky to be there during cherry season! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1391" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1391" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611502.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611502.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611502.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611502.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Along with cherries, the nice woman was selling Erik(?), or these green tart mini-plums. They were good, but couldn&#8217;t eat too man after putting away a couple pounds of cherries. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1392" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1392" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611503.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611503.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611503.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611503.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A van, down by the river (Dardanelles) </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1393" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1393" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611504.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611504.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611504.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611504.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Midye Dolmas&#8230; or rice-stuffed mussels. I tried these on a recommendation from Seda and Serdar, and they were amazing. They&#8217;re sold on the street in Istanbul and lots of other places&#8230; put your food safety fears aside and try (at least) one! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1394" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1394" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611505.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611505.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611505.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061611505.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161150.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I was on my way to Canakkale, but wanted to take a ferry over the Dardanelles to Gallipoli. I found the ferry port in Cardak, and met this guy and his dad while I waited for the ferry. I feel bad I can&#8217;t remember his name, but he took me out for a loop around the area in his fishing boat. We realized we both spoke a little German, so it was funny trying to get by in a language neither of us knew very well. I imagine this is a really crude version of what my ESL science colleagues experience all the time. The guy also told me (in German) that my facebook picture was not a very good one. WTF, thanks! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1395" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1395" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161446.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161446.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706161446.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Motorbike on a ferryboat, crossing the dardanelles from Asia into Europe! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1397" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1397" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614462.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614462.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614462.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614462.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Gallipoli cheesemonger! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1398" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1398" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614463.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614463.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614463.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614463.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Delicious market snack&#8230; cucumber with fresh cream cheese and a spicy pepper paste (Aji Biber). </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1399" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1399" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614464.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614464.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614464.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614464.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I went to a war museum in Gallipoli, and it was cool but everything was in Turkish so I didn&#8217;t understand a whole lot. I was pretty amused by the toilet seat in the museum&#8217;s bathroom too&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1400" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1400" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614465.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614465.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614465.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614465.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Gas for the scooter was so expensive&#8230; 1 Turkish Lira = 50 cents or so&#8230; cost me over $10 to fill the scooter tank. I could fill my scooter tank in Seattle for about $4. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1401" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1401" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614466.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614466.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614466.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061614466.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706161446.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I wasn&#8217;t riding a bike at this time, but I still had a radar for em. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Headed south from Canakkale, to the ancient city of Troy. I was excited, but also a little bummed that I had never actually read the Iliad or Odyssey, and didn&#8217;t do nearly enough research in advance to appreciate fully what I was about to see. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1406" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1406" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621561.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621561.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621561.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621561.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1409" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1409" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621564.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621564.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621564.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621564.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Here&#8217;s a color-coded cross section of the current idea about all of the Troy ruins. There were actually many Troy cities, built above and around previous ones. It was unclear how archaeologists figured out the order in which each city was built, but the whole place is like many concentric rings on a large elevated mound. Colors indicate time&#8230; see the time scale bar. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1407" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1407" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621562.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621562.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621562.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621562.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Troy </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1408" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1408" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621563.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621563.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621563.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621563.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Part of a ceiling piece in Troy&#8230; it was pretty awesome that these had been preserved for so long (since 2000-3000 BC?!) </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> An Australian guy and his mom, who I met at the Pansiyon in Canakkale and saw again at Troy. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1411" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1411" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621566.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621566.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621566.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621566.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I think the signs said this was an event hall, or a place where a king would hold court or give speeches. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1412" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1412" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621567.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621567.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621567.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621567.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Good ol&#8217; Honda Fizy 125&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1413" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1413" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621568.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621568.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621568.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621568.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A pretty mosque along the way from Troy to the Geyikkli Ferry dock. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1414" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1414" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621569.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621569.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621569.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061621569.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162156.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Not much traffic at this point&#8230; apparently tourist season here officially starts in June, so I was a little early. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1415" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1415" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162427.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162427.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162427.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Olive trees, I think&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1416" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1416" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624271.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624271.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624271.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624271.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On the ferry to Bozcaada island (pronounced &#8220;bo-JAH-da&#8221;)&#8230; I couldn&#8217;t believe that this dude in the pink tie AND the traveling musician came together in the same ridiculous photo for me. Thanks, guys. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1417" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1417" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624272.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624272.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624272.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624272.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is Ratip, who I met on the Ferry. His daughter has a Pansiyon on the island and in very little english he enthusiastically suggested I come and stay there. I said thanks, I&#8217;ll look around. I did know at the time that Ratip would end up curating my entire visit to the island. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1418" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1418" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624273.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624273.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624273.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624273.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I got to the island with the scooter, thanked Ratip, and said I&#8217;d prefer to wander around first and find a place to stay on my own, but that I&#8217;d hold onto his card for sure. The island was strangely deserted though! I knocked on the doors of 3 Pansiyons and hotels and there was literally no one there. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1419" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1419" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624274.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624274.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624274.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061624274.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162427.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After about an hour of searching, I found myself in front of Ratip&#8217;s daughter&#8217;s Pansiyon. It was a really nice place, and he gave me a good deal. He also introduced me to all his friends (he seemed to know everyone on the island!) and showed me all the postcards he had received from guests over the last 20 years. So cute&#8230; he hardly spoke English but had a pretty unmistakeable smile. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1421" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1421" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626181.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626181.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626181.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626181.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I spent two nights on Bozcaada, after the first I took the scooter and rode by myself all around. I stopped at the beach (requisite grass-umbrella beach shot, sorry). </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1422" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1422" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626182.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626182.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626182.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626182.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My island tour continues, after lunch at the beach. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1423" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1423" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626183.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626183.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626183.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626183.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bozcaada is famous in turkey for its wine grapes and wineries. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1424" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1424" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626184.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626184.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626184.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626184.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Huge wind farm&#8230; these generators produce enough power for 20,000 homes (according to a sign nearby). </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1425" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1425" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626185.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626185.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626185.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626185.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bozcaada coast. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1426" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1426" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626186.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626186.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626186.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061626186.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162618.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More coastline, almost back to where I started. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1427" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1427" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162816.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162816.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162816.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706162816.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stopped for a little wine taste on the way&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Tiny cobblestone streets&#8230; almost entirely to myself. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1430" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1430" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628163.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628163.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628163.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628163.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1431" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1431" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628164.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628164.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628164.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628164.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I asked Ratip where I could buy some wine from the island, and he took me here. I tried to pay for the wine, and the other guy wouldn&#8217;t let me&#8230; I think Ratip actually owns the winery where these are made. So nice!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1432" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1432" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628165.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628165.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628165.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061628165.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706162816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> It looks like two people could be eating here, at this awesome table by the marina. But nope, this was a date with myself. Had to try two kinds of wine. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1433" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1433" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706163051.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706163051.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706163051.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ratip&#8217;s friend Hasan (in Red), who runs this little coffee stand. We hung out here a lot. After I got back from my motorbike island tour and in the morning before I left, I could count on finding Ratip and his buds here. It was really cool to have some people to go drink tea and coffee with. Ratip is on the right. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1434" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1434" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630511.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630511.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630511.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630511.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After leaving Bozcaada in the morning by ferry, I took a route along the coast and stopped in a little town for a tea and a walk along this jetty. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1435" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1435" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630512.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630512.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630512.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630512.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The climate was really dry and windy&#8230; lots of scrubby grassland plants like this. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1436" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1436" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630513.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630513.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630513.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630513.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This leg of the trip was the most rural and the most desserted&#8230; I think I saw maybe two cars over 80 km or so. It was fun to be on some really tiny roads. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1437" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1437" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630514.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630514.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630514.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061630514.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706163051.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1439" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1439" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649051.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649051.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649051.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649051.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stopped into this little village to ask about something to eat for lunch&#8230; I think I interruped a group of men who were hanging out just outside a mosque. I liked this turquoise door on a house in the same town. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1440" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1440" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649052.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649052.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649052.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649052.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; Oh Halophiles, can&#8217;t give you up! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1442" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1442" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649054.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649054.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649054.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061649054.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706164905.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I found this hotel in Asos for a good deal&#8230; turns out I was the only one staying in the whole place. There wasn&#8217;t really a town associated with the area&#8230; just some hotels along a long strip of beach. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px;
