height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Went for a walk in Asos before heading to bed. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1448" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1448" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706165508.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706165508.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706165508.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706165508.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Continuing along the coast, from Asos to Akcay. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1450" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1450" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655082.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655082.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655082.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655082.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After leaving Asos, I didn&#8217;t actually know where I would stop for the day, but after grabbing lunch in Akcay, I had to stay the night. This was probably my favorite town on the route&#8230;. cool oceanfront public space, markets, lots of people but not obnoxiously much&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1451" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1451" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655083.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655083.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655083.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061655083.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706165508.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Some dudes outside playing Rummikub </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1452" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1452" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172816.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172816.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172816.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I loved all the long coats and scarves! Most of the time I was glad I wasn&#8217;t the one wearing them (it was pretty warm out!), but they were pretty. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1457" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1457" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728165.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728165.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728165.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728165.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is Turan Senner, the loud and friendly proprietor of my Pansiyon, Hotel Set. This guy was fantastic&#8230; he had lived in the US for 10 years (in the 80s-90s) and had been back in Turkey ever since. He was really into Turkish rap music and I&#8217;ve been collecting music on the trip, so we had fun YouTubing for his favorites. At the time he was also having trouble figuring out how to connect with a longtime friend in the US via Facebook or Skype. Long story short, I was able to help him figure it out and we got his friend in NYC on the phone that same evening. So fun to see the two of them reconnect! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1453" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1453" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728161.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728161.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728161.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728161.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> View from the top deck of Hotel Set in Akcay. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1454" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1454" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728162.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728162.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728162.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728162.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1455" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1455" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728163.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728163.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728163.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728163.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> So many dates!!! The big ones in the middle are my favorite&#8230; they&#8217;re called Kudus, from Israel. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1456" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1456" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728164.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728164.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728164.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061728164.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172816.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Since Turkey was my last stop, I bought a ton of these cool handpainted dishes to bring home. Only one bowl was broken when I got back to the US! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1458" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1458" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172922.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172922.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172922.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706172922.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Lunch cafe in Akcay. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1459" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1459" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729221.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729221.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729221.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729221.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On the road again&#8230; roadside produce stand between Akcay and Balikesir. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1460" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1460" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729222.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729222.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729222.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061729222.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706172922.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Headed back to Bandirma&#8230; I was going tostay the night in another town, Balikesir, but when I stopped and asked someone where the central district was, he looked at me and asked &#8220;really? You want to stay here? I&#8217;d just keep going to Bandirma.&#8221; So I did, and I was glad. Mehmet, the nice guy who rented me the scooter, had mentioned his mom and sister lived in Bandirma and to call if I wanted to meet them. I called Mehmet and he called his sister&#8230; so nice to have a family waiting for me when I arrived. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1467" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1467" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173400.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173400.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173400.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173400.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173400.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173400.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Mehmet&#8217;s mom (Muzeyyen), his sister&#8217;s husband (Cuneyt), and his sister, Hacer. So, so nice to meet them and to stay with a family. It had been awhile. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1461" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1461" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173134.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173134.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173134.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Muzeyyen took me all around Bandirma the next day, before my ferry back to Istanbul. This is in one of the street markets. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1462" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1462" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731341.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731341.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731341.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731341.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Chicks in a street market. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1463" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1463" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731342.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731342.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731342.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731342.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We walked on a rainbow!!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1464" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1464" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731343.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731343.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731343.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731343.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is the Quran&#8230; I had never seen it before. I obviously can&#8217;t read arabic, but it was really beautiful just to look at the script. Muzeyyen was also really kind and answered my questions about the 5 prayers a day, and showed me how she prays at home. I knew &#8220;Muslims pray 5 times a day,&#8221; but had no idea what this looks like. She showed me how she washes her face, hands and feet, and then lays her prayer mat down facing Mecca. Then there&#8217;s a series of hand gestures where you cross your hands over your chest, and touch your face (apologies to my Muslim friends for probably messing this up!). There&#8217;s also a string of beads, reminiscient of a rosary, with beads that symbolize the 33 prayer recitations. She also told me all about the Muezzins, or the men who chant the call to prayer every day 5 times. I wondered if it was ever a recording played over a loud speaker&#8230; nope, there&#8217;s a guy who sings (recites?) the call to prayer, 5 times, every day! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1465" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1465" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731344.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731344.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731344.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731344.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Love these little coffee shops with nuts and treats. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1466" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1466" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731345.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731345.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731345.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061731345.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173134.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> She also showed me how to where a scarf&#8230; so many ways to wrap these things! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1468" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1468" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173419.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706173419.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173419.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173419.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706173419.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706173419.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back in Istanbul at Hotel Torun&#8230; this is Nigora, who works at the hotel and has an interesting story. She&#8217;s Uzbek and a journalist, but has grown up in Kyrgyzstan. She worked for a Kyrgyz TV network, but was fired when Kyrgyz nationalists came to power and didn&#8217;t like the way she was telling the news. There is historically anti-Uzbek sentiment in this country, and she told me she lost her job when the political climate changed. So, she came to Turkey and is working in the hotel while trying to find a way to continue as a journalist there. She speaks Turkish (We were able to talk through google translate, and a document she had translated into English about her career story). It&#8217;s a pretty amazing summary she&#8217;s written&#8230; happy to share with anyone interested in reading it. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Back in Istanbul, I returned the scooter to Mehmet, and found my way on the Tram to the airport to pick up Cora!!! So excited to see her and have a Seattle pal to explore the city with.  I didn&#8217;t see much of Istanbul before she arrived, so it was new for both of us.  She was just starting a month-long trip around Europe, and it was amazing to travel a few days with someone who had fresh eyes and a less road-weary perspective.  It made the end of my trip new again and I am really grateful to her for that. We had a blast shopping, sightseeing, wandering, eating, and learning our way around.  The day she left was the one-year anniversary of last year&#8217;s Istiklal square protest, where police killed 7 people.  A memorial had been planned, and the entire city seemed to be in shutdown mode. It was exciting in a slightly scary &#8220;what&#8217;s about to happen??&#8221; kind of way, to experience something like what we&#8217;ve seen in the news over here, and to talk with people about the whole thing in person. Finally, I spent the last few days visiting other places in the city, including the 600-year old Cemberlitas Hamam&#8230; a Turkish spa where you basically go to take a bath in public.  Rather, people bathe you.  Fun, but a little weird. Here&#8217;s an album from Istanbul, minus the Turkish Hamam.  No photos allowed in there!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The tiles were really beautiful, and the carpet was sooo soft and squishy on our bare feet. We had to wait til a few men inside had left, before we could go in and walk around. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1478" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1478" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061740294.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706174029.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061740294.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061740294.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061740294.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706174029.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Lunch on the northeast side of the Bosphorus </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1492" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1492" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175541.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175541.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175541.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175541.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175541.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175541.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Turkish tea! Turns out Turkey is top in the world for national tea consumption&#8230; not surprised! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1493" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1493" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175821.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175821.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175821.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175821.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back in Istanbul&#8230; visiting the Hagia Sofya. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1494" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1494" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175750.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175750.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175750.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706175750.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The Hagia Sofiya has a really cool history, because it was originally a Catholic Cathedral. It burned down and was rebuilt twice, and was converted to a Mosque when the Ottomans took Istanbul. Inside, you can see Muslim as well as Christian art and imagery. It is now a museum, and isn&#8217;t used for active worship anymore. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1495" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1495" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757501.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757501.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757501.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757501.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A painting from when the Hagia Sofya was a cathedral&#8230; under restoration when we were there. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1496" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1496" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757502.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757502.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757502.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061757502.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175750.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This small staircase is a feature of Mosques&#8230; the Imam gives speeches from here, and climbs up the stairs to make his points as he speaks. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A cross carved into the Marble floor&#8230; clues to the Hagia Sofya&#8217;s past as a cathedral. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px;
