height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> There was a big display of Arabic calligraphy inside as well&#8230; I thought these were so cool. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1499" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1499" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758211.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758211.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758211.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758211.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More calligraphy </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1500" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1500" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758212.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758212.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758212.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758212.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Street cats, inside the museum! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1502" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1502" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758214.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758214.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758214.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061758214.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706175821.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Folks hanging out at the foot-wash, outside another Mosque in Istanbul </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1503" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1503" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182637.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182637.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182637.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Inside the Basilica Cistern&#8230; an amazing and very old public health innovation! Built during the 6th century, the emperor realized that if Istanbul was going to be attacked, its citizens would need a source of safe water if they would survive. The cistern is 500 ft underground, and is supported by a bunch of columns that were basically leftovers from building a Basilica a few centuries earlier. You can tell, because none of the columns match&#8230; they&#8217;re all different. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1504" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1504" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826371.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826371.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826371.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826371.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> At one point, the whole cistern was filled with mud, and then it was dug out and protected as a museum after that. There are fish swimming around in the water now, not sure you&#8217;d want to drink it. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1505" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1505" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826372.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826372.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826372.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826372.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Upside-down medusa head&#8230;. a couple of the columns used to support the cistern had medusas on them, but they installed them upside down, apparently. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1506" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1506" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826373.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826373.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826373.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826373.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Last day with Cora <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-sad' title=':('>:(</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1507" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1507" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826374.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826374.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826374.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826374.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Delicious pastries! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1508" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1508" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826375.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826375.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826375.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826375.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Last trip to the turkish delight store for Cora </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1509" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1509" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826376.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826376.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826376.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826376.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A wedding going on on Istiklal St., on May 31st which was the anniversary of the riots in this area last year. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1510" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1510" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826377.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826377.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826377.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826377.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> An anti-anti-government protest parade. I had to get off the tram a few stops before my hotel, because the city shut down all access to the area where the memorial/protest would be. I walked and talked with a guy on the same train who was walking in my same direction&#8230; he explained to me that this parade was made of Islamist government supporters, who were &#8220;trying to use the completely unrelated plight for Palestinian autonomy to get support for suppressing the protesters/memorial-goers.&#8221; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1511" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1511" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826378.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826378.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826378.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061826378.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182637.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More of the anti-anti-government parade&#8230; the people in the parade were chanting in Arabic. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1512" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1512" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182731.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706182731.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182731.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182731.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706182731.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706182731.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Istanbul mobilized about 10,000 police to keep protesters from occupying Taksim Square and Istiklal street. I had already dropped Cora off at the airport by this time, and I had to go back to our hotel, pick up my bags, and move them to my hostel. I hadn&#8217;t planned to have to cross a police barricade with all my bags, on foot, but they let me through. As I was walking down the completely empty street, my throat started to burn, but not like it burns when you cook chilies in your kitchen. A little different. I figured it must be tear gas from about 1km away&#8230; can&#8217;t imagine how awful it must&#8217;ve been for the people at the center of it. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1516" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1516" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935553.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935553.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935553.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935553.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Finally reached my hostel&#8230;. Red River Hostel was nice, quiet and the owner Fevzi was really helpful. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1513" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1513" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193555.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193555.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193555.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The next morning I went walking down Istiklal just to see if there was anything to be seen from the night before. looked like a normal rainy day&#8230; all the cops and barracades were gone. And, turns out you can in fact find turkish coffee at Starbucks in Turkey. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1514" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1514" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935551.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935551.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935551.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935551.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Walking toward Istiklal from my Hostel </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1515" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1515" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935552.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935552.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935552.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935552.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Roasted chestnuts&#8230; these little stands were everywhere, and the chestnuts were tasty. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1517" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1517" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935554.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935554.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935554.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935554.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Walking around Sultanahmet&#8230; Carpet shop </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1518" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1518" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935555.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935555.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935555.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935555.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Enjoying some Gulluoglu Baklava with some new Cornell friends! My friend Soraya put Ariane and her boyfriend Demirhan in touch with me, and it was great to meet them. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1519" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1519" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935556.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935556.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935556.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935556.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Demirhan and Ariane&#8230; Turns out we all overlapped at Cornell but didn&#8217;t know each other&#8230; Demirhan was a PhD student when I was an undergrad. Ariane was an architecture student ,so it was super fun to walk around Istanbul and learn about the mosques and arcitechture from her. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1520" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1520" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935557.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935557.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935557.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935557.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193555.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Let&#8217;s put all of the random extra tiles&#8230; Here! Awesome tile wall at a mosque near the Eminonu marina. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1521" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1521" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193546.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193546.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193546.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-20140706193546.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Close up of the mosque wall </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1522" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1522" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935461.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935461.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935461.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935461.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More tiles </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1523" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1523" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935462.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935462.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935462.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935462.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> They provided Mosque-appropriate clothing for the uninitiated! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1524" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1524" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935463.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935463.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935463.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/wpid-photo-201407061935463.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140706193546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Arabic numerals on a clock in the mosque. Maybe appropriately, this clock is the last photo in my album&#8230;?! Time for this incredible trip to end&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>And&#8230; that&#8217;s it&#8230;?! I packed my bags, picked up my bike from Hotel Torun and got on a plane. I would love to go back to Turkey, to see more of Istanbul and more of the country&#8230; I didn&#8217;t make it to the east or south coast at all, which I&#8217;ve heard are amazing and more than worth the trip out of the city.</p>
<p>As a closing to the entire trip, I have an epilogue that I want to write, to give some final thoughts and reflections on the trip as a whole.  Once I got back to Seattle, it was so good to see Ed and my friends, but we had to pack up our entire lives in less than three weeks in order to move to yet another new place (Atlanta) for an amazing job (that I&#8217;m really grateful to have). I definitely felt like I wasn&#8217;t quite my old self when I got back, and had a hard time adjusting to making group decisions and living with another person. Poor Ed, he&#8217;s a saint for putting up with this &#8220;readjustment&#8221;!</p>
<p>Even though I&#8217;m back, and we&#8217;ve moved into a new place in Atlanta, I still feel like I&#8217;m on the move, and not really in a permanent home just yet.  Because of all the chaos with moving, I haven&#8217;t been able to devote much time and space to thinking, talking and reflecting on the trip, and I&#8217;m getting a little worried that that chance will slip away the more time that goes by.  It really helped to talk with another recently-returned fellow back in Seattle&#8230; nice to share the &#8220;What the hell just happened to me?!&#8221; sentiment with someone who&#8217;s been there.</p>
<p>More later, hopefully with a better answer to that question, and any others I come up with in the meantime!  Until then, I want to end this post with a lot of thanks, to a lot of people.</p>
<p>I want to thank David Bonderman, Helene Obradovich and Marilyn Gray at UW for the idea, funding and operations that have made this amazing opportunity a reality for so many of us. I still can hardly believe it even exists, and I just lived it.  I&#8217;m so, so grateful to Ed for holding down the fort, caring for all the animals, Skying with me and visiting me over the last 8 months&#8230; there&#8217;s a lot back home I didn&#8217;t have to worry about, and that made this journey even more of dream-come-true.  Thanks to my family who were excited for me, kept in touch, and didn&#8217;t let on too much how scared they were that I&#8217;d get kidnapped.  Thanks to friends who would check in every so often&#8230; it was really nice to know I wasn&#8217;t totally forgotten back home!  I owe a huge debt of gratitude to my colleagues at ISB too&#8230; Nitin, Elisabeth, and Nic, who took the lead on resubmitting our manuscript after I left and couldn&#8217;t lead the effort myself.  I&#8217;m lucky to have worked with such an amazing team&#8230; it&#8217;s pretty rare to have a paper gone so quickly, and it&#8217;s all thanks to these guys.  Finally, I want to thank all of the people I&#8217;ve met, many of whom were introduced in this blog&#8230; the people who welcomed me into their homes, into their hotels and restaurants (even with my bike!), and everybody who took the time to chat or answer probably-stupid questions in a bad rendition of their language.  Throughout the trip, I&#8217;ve had the sense that the world opened up and gave me a big hug, and it&#8217;s thanks to the collective of new friends and acquaintances I had the privilege of meeting, for giving me that.  I have a brand new sense of what it means to be a host and friend to someone far from home, and I look forward to paying the gift forward.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
					</div><!-- .entry -->
					</div><!-- /.middle -->
	<div class="fix"></div>
</div><!-- /.post -->
			
				<div id="post-1360" class="post-1360 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-uncategorized tag-south-india">

	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/05/24/tales-from-the-land-of-perpetual-movember/" title="Permalink to Tales from the land of perpetual&nbsp;Mo&#8217;vember" rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			May 24, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/05/24/tales-from-the-land-of-perpetual-movember/#respond">Leave a comment</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/05/24/tales-from-the-land-of-perpetual-movember/" rel="bookmark">Tales from the land of perpetual&nbsp;Mo&#8217;vember</a>
				</h1>

		<img width="519" height="389" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525024928.jpg?w=519" class="thumbnail main-image wp-post-image" alt="Feeling left out of the mustache club.  The third guy, taking the picture, also had a mustache for the record." data-attachment-id="1371" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525024928.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525024928.jpg?w=479" />
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<p>I&#8217;m sort of embarrassed to admit that one of the first major things I noticed about south India is that the vast majority of men have mustaches. I flew into Bangalore from Bangkok, and during my usual first-day-errands, I hardly saw a shorn upper lip. The guys at my hotel, the guys who drive the auto rickshaws, the guys working at the street food stalls and restaurants&#8230;. nearly all of em, uniformly mustachioed with the same fuzzy caterpillar. Although it was April, it looked like Seattle in November, where lots of dudes grow the Mo&#8217;vember &#8216;stache to raise awareness for prostate cancer and other men&#8217;s health issues <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Movember" rel="nofollow">http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Movember</a>.</p>
<p>The younger guys at the Airtel store were an exception, I noticed, while selling my soul for a couple of SIM cards. After a month in big cities and small towns across Karnataka and Tamil Nadu, mustaches seemed to be positively associated with age and rural-ness, and negatively associated with socioeconomic status. Note though that variables like profession, religion, caste and access to shaving materials were not properly controlled for.</p>
<p>But anyhow! Facial hair style commentary aside, the plan after arriving was to spend two or three days in Bangalore, bus to Mysore, and then start biking. I planned to go from Mysore (3 hrs west of Bangalore, by bus) to the Coorg and Nilgiris regions of the Western Ghat mountains. (You can see the actual route here&#8230; move the map over to south India and zoom in: <a href="https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike" rel="nofollow">https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike</a>) In other words, Operation: heat escape! Before heading out of the city, I did my usual bike assembly, SIM card and cash acquisition, and I bought a few cotton t-shirts. My synthetic biking shirts are just too hot for this climate, and I learned quickly that the sleeves were a bit too short and the necklines a bit too low!  Harsha, a nice guy I met on warmshowers.org, stored my bike box in Bangalore while I was out riding.</p>
<p>Before leaving for Mysore, I got a great intro to Bangalore and Karnataka state from Vijay, who is a colleague of my friend and my dad&#8217;s SO, Diana. Vijay is a project manager and developer for a number of web apps made for American companies, and It was great to meet him along with his wife Ajita and their two daughters. They gave me some good recommendations for places to visit along my ride, and Vijay even let me stay at his vacation flat in Mysore.</p>
<p>I spent two days exploring Mysore on my bike, including a bird sanctuary (with crocodiles!), the grand Mysore palace (Mysore used to be the capital of Karnataka, before it moved to Bangalore), and the big Devaraja food and flower market. I also had my second flat tire of the trip, but this time I wasn&#8217;t alone on the side of an Amazon highway. Turns out flat tires are a good way to make friends. Here&#8217;s an album from the first few days in India.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/05\/24\/tales-from-the-land-of-perpetual-movember\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 479px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="479" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 479px; height: 479px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="479" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1212" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1212" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223204.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223204.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223204.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223204.jpg?w=475&#038;h=475&#038;crop=1" width="475" height="475" data-original-width="475" data-original-height="475" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" alt="" style="width: 475px; height: 475px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Shady streets in Bangalore&#8230;. it&#8217;s known as the Garden City and for me it was a relief to have a cool breeze and big trees. People who live there will all tell you that it&#8217;s terrible now, and that there used to be so many more trees. Sad, but I was still happy to have the leftover shade! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1213" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1213" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232041.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232041.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232041.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232041.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Dear god, the honking&#8230;. this took a long time to get used to. Like more noise is going to make the red light turn faster, huh people? Here was one perhaps feeble attempt to make people reconsider that next beep </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1364" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1364" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525022435.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525022435.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525022435.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525022435.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140525022435.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525022435.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Dinner with Vijay and Ajitha at their condo in Bangalore&#8230;. they gave me a ton of great ideas for things to see on my ride. Vijay was one of the first few non-mustachioed guys I met. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1214" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1214" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232042.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232042.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232042.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232042.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223204.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The 12 km bikeride to the bus station, to get me to Mysore. Most of the ride was chaos shaded by the elevated freeway&#8230;. again, loving being out of the sun!! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Universal truth: anything may be carried on the back of a motorbike </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1216" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1216" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223254.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223254.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223254.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223254.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223254.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223254.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another flat tire , a few km after arriving in Mysore. Again, it wasn&#8217;t a puncture but a valve stem failure on one of those thick puncture resistant tubes. Don&#8217;t buy these!! I found the flat when I pulled into a tire store to fill up with air. I walked the bike out of the way to change the flat, but this gang wanted to help. Fine with me! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1217" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1217" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232541.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223254.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232541.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232541.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192232541.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223254.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Angry kid with huge load of branches. I don&#8217;t know what he was yelling about, but it was hilarious&#8230;. I think maybe he wanted me to buy one of his branches? If I could find this little guy again in 10 years, I would bet that he&#8217;ll have a mustache by then. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1219" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1219" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223350.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223350.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223350.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223350.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519223350.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223350.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bird sanctuary boat tour </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1223" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1223" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192233504.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519223350.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192233504.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192233504.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192233504.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519223350.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; The third guy, taking the picture, also had a mustache for the record. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1372" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1372" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249281.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249281.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249281.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249281.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Lonely bike without its rider, seen on the way out of the Rangantthitu bird sanctuary </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1373" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1373" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249282.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249282.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249282.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249282.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Colorful paints/dyes at the big central market in Mysore </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1374" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1374" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249283.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249283.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249283.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249283.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Flower rainbows at the market </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1375" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1375" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249284.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249284.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249284.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250249284.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525024928.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> It took me a long time before I could pass by a dress shop like this without stopping to stare for awhile. So pretty!! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>The first part of the bike route took me 3 days to reach the hill town of Madikeri in the Coorg region, a low-mountain area (600-1000 m) famous for coffee and pork curries. Coorg women also have a unique way of wrapping their sarees, and a different flavor of Hinduism is practiced here (a larger emphasis on worship of nature and animals as I understand it).</p>
<p>Some broad comments on my first week in India&#8230;<br />
India has definitely been the most culture-shocking place for me, of the whole trip so far. It took me awhile to begin to explain it, and I&#8217;m not sure I can even articulate it very well now. People interacted with me differently than anywhere else, and the traffic and noise were especially jarring as I got going on my bike. I had to be really assertive, sometimes bordering aggressive, to get questions answered or protest an obvious attempt to price gouge me. And it always wigged me out when I&#8217;d smile at someone and they wouldn&#8217;t smile back, especially kids. When you don&#8217;t speak the same language, your face and hands are about all you&#8217;ve got left&#8230;. and it was hard finding a lot of apparently unhappy faces! After about a week though, I was finally used to this and realized that it&#8217;s just the way they roll here, and isn&#8217;t personal in the least. I started making especially goofy grins, just to try to get a rise out of the people I&#8217;d see along the road while cycling.</p>
<p>A few words and a story about price hikes for foreigners&#8230;<br />
This is done a bit differently in India as well. In the other places I&#8217;ve been, either I didn&#8217;t realize I was being gouged (because I felt the price was fair from the start and I don&#8217;t like haggling for sport), or people would appeal to my sense of pity and compassion. In Cambodia for example, I was bartering for a shirt, and a woman said sadly, &#8220;Less than $3.50, no profit.&#8221; How can you take the woman&#8217;s profit?!! So I&#8217;m used to a certain set of sales techniques.</p>
<p>In India though, there were few appeals to pity, compassion or other feelings that make you more likely to open your wallet. Maybe I just look like I have a black heart or something, but I always knew, immediately, that I would be paying a higher price. And I would be bullied into it if I weren&#8217;t ready to stick up for myself. For example, the guy who tried to bully me into paying $10 instead of the usual $5 to put myself and my bike on a bus. I&#8217;ll tell the detailed story sometime over beers, but suffice it to say a small scene was made.</p>
<p>So I got used to being on guard&#8230;. ready to defend myself when paying for things, ready to assert myself when I got ignored by the bus conductors, and ready to slap the hotel porter who tried to sneak a handful of spandex.</p>
<p>I felt safer and saved a little money this way, but I didn&#8217;t like this guarded person very much. I especially didn&#8217;t like this asshole one day when I had to pee at the bus station. Big sign above the bathroom door said &#8220;Pay Toilet: 2 Rupees.&#8221; I gave the attendant 10 Rupees, but she said &#8220;5 Rupees&#8221; and handed me only 5 in change when I expected 8. Was there a math confusion here? I asked for the other 3 Rupees change, and she says &#8220;No, 5 Rupees.&#8221; Wow, that&#8217;s balls&#8230;. Charging me over 200% of what the sign clearly said.</p>
<p>This of course infuriated my battle-ready self, and I couldn&#8217;t see through to the fact that her balls-out sales technique was just trying to meet the same end as the &#8220;no profit&#8221; lady in Cambodia. She just wanted a little extra money, like you, me and 8 billion of our friends. But I got frustrated, pointed to the sign, and asked again in exasperation for my 3 Rupees. Ultimately, she gave me my change. I walked away feeling relieved to have peed for the correct price, and victorious in the Karlyn vs. India arena of self-preservation.</p>
<p>So I &#8220;won&#8221; my 3 Rupees (less than 10 cents) in a &#8220;battle&#8221; against a poor, old woman whose job was to collect money in front of the pay toilet at the bus station. WHO AM I?! If that&#8217;s not a black heart, I don&#8217;t know what is.</p>
<p>I didn&#8217;t like this battle-hardened version of myself at all, and I was shocked that I did not see this for what it was, in the moment. Although it felt like yet another extortionist attack, this was clearly CLEARLY not a battle worth fighting, and there should have been no question about walking away having paid 5 Rupees and not 2.</p>
<p>So, for the rest of my time in India, I tried to keep the Wolverine claws under wraps a little better. And I carried a little more small change, for cripe sake.</p>

She had a cute puppy too!! Hama, her dad and her mom Lakshmi invited me in for a roti&#8230; they didn&#8217;t speak English and I don&#8217;t speak Kannada but we had a good time. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1228" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1228" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348363.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348363.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348363.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348363.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px;
