height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1229" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1229" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348364.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348364.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348364.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348364.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We walked farther through the fields (by this time I had been hanging out with their family for over an hour&#8230;. I got to meet tons of people!) and met these friends (or maybe family?) </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1230" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1230" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348365.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348365.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348365.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348365.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I noticed that the guy and I were both missing chunks of our right thumbs&#8230;. crazy! He wins for having the more gnarly stump though for sure. After walking all around the fields and meeting at least 5 other people, I had to keep biking. But this single stop reminded me why I bike through these places. All my grumbling about the heat and boredom melted away right there. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1231" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1231" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348366.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348366.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348366.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348366.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> There&#8217;s a little hand and a sliver of a face in the window if you look closely&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1232" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1232" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348367.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348367.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348367.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192348367.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519234836.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Buddhist temple in Bylakuppe. There are a few Tibetan refugee settlements in south India and I visited the temple in one of the largest. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1234" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1234" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351471.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351471.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351471.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351471.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> At the Tibetan Buddhist temple, I met a physician (Vijay), his wife (Prabha) and his mother who all live in Atlanta. Crazy coincidence!! We walked around together for awhile and exchanged info so we could get together when I move down there. Serendipitously, we were also able to get together again when I got back to Bangalore. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; It&#8217;s a hard puffed shell filled with a masala broth with onions, tomatoes and lentils. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1237" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1237" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351474.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351474.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351474.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351474.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Gobi Manchuri maker&#8230;. fried spicy cauliflower </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1238" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1238" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351475.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351475.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351475.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351475.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The sidewalk in Kushalnagar was made of these cement planks, and sometimes a few would be missing. Keeps you on your toes. Many sidewalks I saw from here out were made of this stuff, with similar deadly holes. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1239" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1239" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351476.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351476.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351476.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192351476.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235147.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stopped for a chai on the way up the hill to Madikeri </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1240" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1240" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235424.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235424.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235424.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235424.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235424.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235424.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> In Madikeri, I stayed at a homestay and this family was in the room next door. I don&#8217;t remember everyone&#8217;s names, but Pooja is next to me in the blue, and is about to find out where she got into college. We went together to a lookout point called Raja&#8217;s seat. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1241" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1241" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235513.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235513.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235513.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235513.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235513.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235513.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The South Indian food at the Anamiiva homestay was delicious&#8230;. Poonamma gets all the credit! Thankfully they gave me a spoon since I suck pretty bad at eating liquids by hand ((which is how they roll here&#8230;. takes lots of rice to soak it up). </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1242" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1242" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235530.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235530.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235530.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Talakaveri shrine&#8230;. the source of the Kaveri river. This is a holy place for Hindus, especially Coorgs (people from Coorg area where this was taken) </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1243" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1243" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355301.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355301.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355301.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355301.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Talakaveri </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1244" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1244" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355302.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355302.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355302.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355302.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> hehehe </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1245" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1245" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355303.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355303.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355303.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355303.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Photoshoot in the car&#8230; Pooja&#8217;s family was nice enough to let me cram into their car for the Talakaveri visit. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1246" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1246" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355304.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355304.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355304.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355304.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back at the homestay, Suhan and Sumana (daughters of the owners) showed me how to play carom. They schooled me of course but it was fun. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1365" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1365" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250224351.jpg" data-orig-size="764,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140525022435.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250224351.jpg?w=224" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250224351.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405250224351.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140525022435.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Suhan sang with a choir and showed me her music&#8230;. I had never seen the notation for indian, atonal music before. So cool&#8230;. they don&#8217;t use musical notes at all. The top line tells the relative pitch using symbols (I think). It&#8217;s hard since I can&#8217;t tell the difference between the text and the music symbols&#8230;. but when she explained it I was blown away. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1247" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1247" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355305.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355305.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355305.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405192355305.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235530.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another delicious meal&#8230;. I even tried the Coorg pork which is a specialty there. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1248" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1248" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235548.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140519235548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235548.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235548.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140519235548.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140519235548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Heading out from the homestay early in the morning, to get a bus a few hundred km to Ooty. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>It was nice to spend two days in Madikeri with the Bheemaiah family at Anamiiva homestay. The homestay system in India is really cool, and unique among the places I&#8217;ve been so far. You&#8217;re in someone&#8217;s house, but it&#8217;s more structured than, say, couchsurfing.com. There&#8217;s a set price, so you don&#8217;t have that awkward &#8220;How do I say thank you for this&#8230;.&#8221; discussion in your head.</p>
<p>From Madikeri, I took a bus to the mountain town of Ooty (Short for &#8220;Ootacamund,&#8221; which is the anglicized version of &#8220;Udhagamandalam&#8221;). After so many hot, highway miles in SE Asia, I had no qualms about skipping over the potentially crummy places in between the areas I wanted to ride. And it was so worth it&#8230;.the Nilgiris mountains with their tea estates and purple flowering trees made some of the best cycling in this entire trip. It was chilly but sunny, the roads were good, and traffic seemed a little less intense. I biked 25 km out from Ooty to the Pallaniappa tea plantation and stayed for two days&#8230;. I was the only guest at the time, and $20/night paid for the room, all meals, and some good company on a hike around the plantation. I also visited a factory where the young tea leaves are made into black tea&#8230;. picture captions describe the process.</p>

height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The view from my window in Ooty&#8230;. it was nice and chilly there too, 2000m elevation or more! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1251" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1251" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041141.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004114.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041141.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041141.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041141.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004114.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Research institute near my hotel in Ooty </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1254" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1254" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004210.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004210.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004210.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004210.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004210.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004210.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My hotel seemed to be a popular place for big group vacations. I met these ladies and their husbands&#8230;. their husbands were all friends from grad school, PhDs in Linguistics&#8230;. they were all getting together for a long weekend and invited me to eat dinner w/ them. Super fun! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1252" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1252" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041142.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004114.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041142.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041142.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200041142.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004114.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; I was the only one in the whole place! Behind the row-rooms is a kitchen&#8230;. a cool guy named Krishna cooked for me while I was there. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1261" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1261" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200043286.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004328.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200043286.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200043286.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200043286.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004328.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Relaxing for a bit after arriving at Pallaniappa&#8230;. height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This woman literally popped up from a tea hedge, holding this flower&#8230;.. I was startled but she was really pretty in all the green tea. The tea shouldn&#8217;t have a chance to flower if all the green leaf is being picked&#8230;. so it was neat to see what tea flowers actually look like. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1267" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1267" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045532.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004553.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045532.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045532.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045532.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004553.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The top of our hike&#8230;. we started at 6am and got up here around 8. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1268" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1268" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045533.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004553.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045533.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045533.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200045533.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004553.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Subramanian taking my bike for a spin </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1269" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1269" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004725.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004725.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004725.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004725.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bison (or guar) are a big problem in the tea fields because they trample it. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1270" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1270" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004710.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004710.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520004710.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I asked to visit a factory nearby where the green leaf goes to be made into tea. The whole process is really quick, only a couple of hours. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1271" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1271" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047101.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047101.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047101.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047101.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The factory manager at the controls! The factory wasn&#8217;t processing tea that day, but he turned all the machines on to show me how they worked. Don&#8217;t tell OSHA. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1272" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1272" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047102.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047102.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047102.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047102.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> First, the green leaf is &#8220;withered&#8221; to about 45% total moisture. It is spread on these belts where warm air blows for about 3 hours. The leaves are left with a leathery texture. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1273" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1273" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047103.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047103.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047103.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047103.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The withered leaves are dumped through this hole in the floor&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1274" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1274" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047104.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047104.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047104.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047104.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> &#8230;and arrive in the top chute of this machine, which rolls them. When you see large-leaf black tea (called Orange Pekoe), you probably notice it looks twisty. This is why. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1275" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1275" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047105.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047105.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047105.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047105.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Then the twisted leaves go into this screen barrel which separates rolled the leaves by size. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1276" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1276" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047106.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047106.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047106.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047106.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fermentation happens on these boards, but only for about 20 min. Basically the rolled leaves turn from green to brown as plant enzymes and microbes are allowed to break down the sugars and fibers. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1277" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1277" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047107.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047107.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047107.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047107.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Then, the withered, fermented leaves are dried in an over for about half an hour, and separated again by size in these machines. Each of these sacks has a different size of tea leaf, from tiny dust, up to the full-sized orange pekoe. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1278" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1278" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047108.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047108.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047108.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047108.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Four of the different size classes of black tea. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1279" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1279" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047109.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047109.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047109.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047109.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Each size class has a different name, shortened to an acronym which I won&#8217;t be able to remember. Anything &#8220;OP&#8221; means orange peakoe, and is the highest grade. Smaller particles are lower grade teas. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1280" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1280" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471010.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471010.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471010.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471010.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1281" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1281" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471011.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471011.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471011.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471011.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Tea factory record keeping system </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1282" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1282" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471012.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471012.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471012.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-2014052000471012.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004710.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Green leaf is harvested either by hand, by scissors with a box attached (as in this pic) or by machine. Hand picked teas are the best quality, since fewer of the older tougher leaves are accidentally included. Employees at the plantation are provided with housing, water and cooking/heating fuel on site in addition to their salary. I learned this from the english-speaking managers and owners. I wished I could have also spoken with one of these women to ask how she felt about it. I was curious because I also learned that the estates can&#8217;t keep enough workers to pick all the tea, despite having what I&#8217;m told is a sweet compensation/housing deal. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1283" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1283" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047251.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047251.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047251.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047251.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ashwin, the son of the estate owner, and his wife Aishwariya. Aishwariya was trained as an engineer but quit when she got married to run the hospitality part of the tea estate. She said she loves it and has no regrets. Both were really kind, and answered tons tea questions for me! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1284" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1284" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047252.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047252.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047252.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047252.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Cup of tea while I switch out my fat back tire for the skinnier one. I had put this bigger one on in Colombia for the bad road sections, even though it was a little too big to work with my fender. I&#8217;d been sticking to fine roads here, so I decided to put the smaller tire back on since I was worried the bigger tire was rubbing too much on the fender and frame. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1285" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1285" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047253.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047253.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047253.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405200047253.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520004725.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stopping at a different tea estate just to buy some handmade tea (i.e. no factory&#8230;. withering, fermenting, drying, size separation by hand). This was on my ride out from Pallaniappa to the city of Coimbatore. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1287" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1287" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082145.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520082145.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082145.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082145.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082145.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520082145.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Flowers&#8230;. these shops smelled amazing like jasmine </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1286" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1286" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082100.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140520082100.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082100.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082100.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140520082100.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140520082100.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Windy road down the mountain&#8230;. just to give an idea of how little space there was! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>After leaving the Pallaniappa tea estate, I biked a few more days to the city of Coimbatore, and then decided to return to Ooty and then Mysore by bike. This route gave me a few more days of cool mountain air, and the chance to bike through two national tiger reserve parks. In Mysore, I had a place to stay (thanks to Vijay) where I could cook for myself, do laundry, and visit parts of the city I missed the first time around.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>There are a million awesome places to go in India, but I decided to spend all of my last two weeks in India in an apartment in Bangalore. I didn&#8217;t take a trip out to the Goa beaches, and I didn&#8217;t bike along the southern coast like I had considered. &#8220;Why?&#8221; and &#8220;Why not??&#8221; are good questions! Sometimes I wondered myself&#8230;.</p>
<p>But, the truth is I got tired of traveling and spending time on logistics. It had been awhile since I stayed put in any one place for more than a couple days&#8230;. the last time was late February, when I was getting ready to leave the Philippines. And, traveling with a combination of bike, bus and train in India requires much, much more advanced planning than I have had to do so far. Trains are booked solid months in advance, so these were not really an option for me. Only two types of busses had space for a bicycle, so my usual fail-safe strategy of &#8220;show up, get on bus&#8221; wasn&#8217;t so great anymore. Advanced research was also needed for hotel-finding, if only to avoid parading around in my bike shorts looking for a place to stay.</p>
<p>And guys, it turns out Bangalore is Awesome! Before my trip, my impression of Bangalore was &#8220;that place where the people who answer tech support phonecalls work.&#8221; And while there are lots of call centers in B&#8217;lore, the rest of the city is pretty cool and I had a good time &#8220;living&#8221; there for a couple weeks. The city has tons of trees and shade, and I stayed in a part of town where I could walk to several microbreweries. So for two weeks, I explored the city, tried out new restaurants and street food every day, and went out with new friends like it was one big perpetual weekend.</p>
<p>More stories from Bangalore are in the photo captions, but I want to thank some really kind, generous and fun people here in the main text for spending time with me and showing me their city. Cheers to Harsha Majety, Vijay and Ajita Prabhakar, Keerthi Rao, Maija Pilkkonen, Veena Raghunandan, Manoj Payardha, Vijay Varma and his cousins Ramesh and Rama, Uma Shankar, and Venky Shivarama from WheelSports.</p>

height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Offering baskets for sale near the Chamundi temple </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; This was a nice hefeweisen. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1324" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1324" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524172130.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140524172130.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524172130.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524172130.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524172130.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140524172130.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A salad bar!! Probably not the healthiest decision I&#8217;ve made on this trip, but I couldn&#8217;t resist. Ate here 3 times at least, and didn&#8217;t have any issues within a plausible incubation time of consuming the goods&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1325" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1325" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721301.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140524172130.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721301.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721301.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721301.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140524172130.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; This group provides after-school education, extra lessons, supplemental food and college prep help for selected kids from Bangalore&#8217;s squatter settlements. They support each student until they finish college and find jobs&#8230;. the center has been around long enough that its very first students have just finished college. I got to meet two of them&#8230;. really inspiring. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1329" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1329" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721522.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140524172152.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721522.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721522.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-201405241721522.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140524172152.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px;
