height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Visiting Veena at her house once more before I left&#8230;. so sad to leave after meeting such nice folks. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1359" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1359" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524174011.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140524174011.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524174011.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524174011.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/wpid-photo-20140524174011.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140524174011.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Venky is a friend who runs a few bike shops in Bangalore called Wheel Sports. I meet him through Jacky, the cyclist who works at ProBike in Bangkok. If you&#8217;re in Bangalore looking for anything bike-related, here&#8217;s your guy&#8230;. he did me the huge favor of a ride to the airport with my giant box. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>Now, I&#8217;m rested and ready for some adventure in Turkey, which is my last stop before this whole shenanigan comes to an end. I have mixed feelings about the end of Bonderman, but right now I&#8217;m psyched to be in Istanbul, about to take a 125cc scooter down to the coast. It&#8217;s not over til it&#8217;s over!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
					</div><!-- .entry -->
					</div><!-- /.middle -->
	<div class="fix"></div>
</div><!-- /.post -->
			
				<div id="post-1207" class="post-1207 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized tag-thailand">

	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/04/25/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my/" title="Permalink to Elephants, sticky rice and tent cities, oh&nbsp;my!" rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			April 25, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/04/25/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my/#comments">2 Comments</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/04/25/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my/" rel="bookmark">Elephants, sticky rice and tent cities, oh&nbsp;my!</a>
				</h1>

		
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<p>My route through Thailand from the Cambodian border to Bangkok took me through the eastern part of the country. And, if you look at a map, it probably seems like I was trying hard to avoid all the usual destinations! (Phuket, Ko samui, Chiang Mai&#8230;.). I saw some amazing things though, especially at Khao Yai National Park (Elephants and Gibbons!! read on!). I made some great new friends, and got to reconnect with a friend from Cornell who I hadn&#8217;t seen in almost 10 years.</p>
<p>Here are a few photo sets from the ride&#8230;. I came through the Poipet-Aranyaprathet border crossing and went east to Sa Kaeo, north through Khao Yai national park, up to Lopburi, and then back down the main corridor through Ayutthaya to Bangkok.</p>
<p>My first night in Thailand was set up to be another round of the usual routine&#8230;. arrive early afternoon, look for a hotel and some food, shower, wash stinky bike clothes in the sink, wander around town to find dinner, and go to bed&#8230;. ready to wake up at 5am to do the same thing again the next day. I nearly completed this sequence in Aranyaprathet, when during the &#8220;wander around&#8221; phase, someone noticed I was struggling to figure out what was cooking in a pot at a street stall. She spoke English, and helped me order, and then invited me to sit with her and her mom to eat. Her name is Suteera, but she goes by Sushi (which happens to be her favorite food <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span>. I ended up staying two nights in Aran since I wasn&#8217;t feeling very well, so that meant I got to hang out with these fine ladies a second time.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/04\/25\/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1123" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1123" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637064.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637064.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637064.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637064.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My hotel in Aranyaprathet&#8230;. it had a swimming pool for guests!!! Perfect thing after biking across the border in the heat. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1119" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1119" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418163706.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418163706.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418163706.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Sushi and her mom in the jewelery store they own. Sushi&#8217;s boyfriend and brother live in Bangkok, but she&#8217;s expected to stay and take on the family business. She didn&#8217;t seem super thrilled about this, but was happy to be able to spend the time with her mom. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1120" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1120" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637061.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637061.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637061.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637061.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Street market photo </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1121" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1121" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637062.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637062.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637062.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637062.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One of the stops on my food tour with Sushi and her mom&#8230;. this is a chinese dessert of tofu and puffed rice things, swimming in a steeped ginger broth. Delicious and spicy! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1122" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1122" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637063.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637063.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637063.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637063.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bugs n&#8217; frogs&#8230;. Not sure what&#8217;s in the spray bottle tho&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1124" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1124" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637065.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637065.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637065.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181637065.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418163706.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pad thai and the &#8220;best satay in Aran.&#8221; Apparently the satay man has been perfecting his product for 30 years! Ignore the helmet hair&#8230;. :)) </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>I left Aran feeling better, and ready for the ride to Khao Yai park, which would take about 4 days. Some of that time was nice, some of it was boring highway. I spent my 30th birthday at a random highway hotel, alone on a day when the government banned alcohol sales for an upcoming election. Major fail, Thailand!! But, I found a nice restaurant and had some chocolate cake and a diet coke! Road stories are in the picture captions, including a nearly-abandoned set of cottages that saved my ass when I was looking for a place to stay near the park entrance.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/04\/25\/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1125" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1125" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165638.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165638.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165638.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165638.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Awake with the monks at 6:30am&#8230;. just leaving Aranyaprathet on my bike. Poor guys and their bare feet! This was day 1 of about 4, making my way to Khao Yai National Park. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1126" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1126" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656381.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656381.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656381.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656381.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Often, road signs are the highlights of my rides. This was one of about 100 signs that said &#8220;STEAK.&#8221; Curry puff sounded good, but I didn&#8217;t stop. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1128" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1128" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165740.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165740.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165740.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165740.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165740.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165740.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Thai busstop </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1127" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1127" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656382.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656382.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656382.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181656382.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165638.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Often there is a series of vendors all selling the same things along the road. I play this game where I try to guess what the things are, and if I can&#8217;t, I&#8217;ll stop and try one. These stumped me for sure. It was sticky rice stuffed inside a sugar cane stalk and steamed in there. There was a little &#8220;cap&#8221; of wood wrapped in banana leaf on top, to keep the moisture in. That threw me off. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1129" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1129" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165802.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165802.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165802.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165802.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Birthday lunch! Papaya salad and pork (I think&#8230;). It was waaayy too spicy, but delicious so I ate it anyway! I didn&#8217;t end up eating the pork since it was all fatty pieces and honestly I thought it was chicken when I ordered it before they cut if up. You must assume these risks when ordering street food. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1130" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1130" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658021.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658021.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658021.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658021.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These trees were blooming all along the roads&#8230;. I learned later that people plant them in honor of the King. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1131" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1131" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658022.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658022.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658022.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658022.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> &#8220;Vote for me, I have a PhD!&#8221; Haha, not sure that&#8217;s a good idea!?? There were lots of political signs as it was election season. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1132" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1132" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658023.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658023.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658023.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181658023.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165802.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Some craft stalls on a nice road once I got off the busy road. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1133" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1133" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165915.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165915.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418165915.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My plan was to find a place to stay just outside Khao Yai, before starting the climb up to the top. My GPS said there was one place close to the entrance, called &#8220;Moon River.&#8221; If it didn&#8217;t exist, I&#8217;d have to backtrack 10 km or more to find something else. Luckily, I spotted this sign! I followed the dirt road, and there was no sign of activity. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1134" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1134" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659151.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659151.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659151.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659151.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The Moon River property was clearly a place to host guests&#8230;. there were lots of these little cottages. I rode around, calling &#8220;Sawadee?&#8221;, and then I saw a woman who had been sleeping in a garage on the other side of the property. She didn&#8217;t speak English, but I managed to communicate that I was looking for a place to stay. So she called her sister (the owner) in Bangkok, who spoke some English and everything worked great. I got to stay in this little cottage, with hot water, AC and a small kitchen! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1135" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1135" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659152.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659152.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659152.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659152.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Moon River was a long way from any civilization though, so the owner&#8217;s sister let me use her scooter to go to the market for some dinner if I would fill it with gas. No problem! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1136" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1136" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659153.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659153.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659153.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659153.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The next morning, I started the climb into the park! 40km up to the top where I had booked a park cottage. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>The road through Khao Yai is 60 km long, and after leaving Moon River, I biked 40 km into the mountains to the lodge I had booked inside the park. It was so nice to escape the heat, even though it was a hard climb to get there! I had booked a room in a hostel-like lodge in the park, and it was great because my neighbors at the lodge were bike people too. They were a Thai family, and the dad Jacky works for the largest Trek distributor in Thailand. It&#8217;s called Probike, located in Bangkok. We exchanged info, and I planned to visit him again for a tuneup and to buy a cardboard bike box in Bangkok. I stayed in the park one night, and then rode down out of the park and stayed at a lodge about 20km outside, which offered guided park tours and visits to a nearby bat cave. THE BAT CAVE. I am so glad I took the tour&#8230;. I would&#8217;ve left the park without seeing much of the wildlife at all if I&#8217;d skipped it!</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/04\/25\/elephants-sticky-rice-and-tent-cities-oh-my\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 479px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="479" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 479px; height: 479px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="479" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1137" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1137" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659154.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659154.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659154.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659154.jpg?w=475&#038;h=475&#038;crop=1" width="475" height="475" data-original-width="475" data-original-height="475" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 475px; height: 475px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Once I entered the park, there were a few offshoot trails out to see waterfalls or other lookout points. This one I tried to bike to, but then there were stairs later on&#8230;. oops! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Aha, I am totally gonna see an elephant today! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1139" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1139" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659156.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659156.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659156.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659156.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Definitely evidence of elephant. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1140" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1140" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659157.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659157.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659157.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181659157.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418165915.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pretty pond, up at the top. No elephants here though. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1141" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1141" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418170735.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418170735.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418170735.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1142" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1142" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707351.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707351.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707351.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707351.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I imagined elephants standing here, really hard. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1143" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1143" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707352.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707352.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707352.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707352.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Looks sort of like US National parks, doesn&#8217;t it? This is the house where i stayed in the park. Booking this house was an accomplishment in itself&#8230;. I had to figure out the online reservation system (using a series of blogs and Thai websites) and then had to physically visit a branch of the bank where the Thai national park service has its account. I was to transfer about $15 into the account. This took about half an hour and 6 people at the bank, who had to call the park service to figure out what was going on&#8230;. turns out I was supposed to print something out which I didn&#8217;t do in advance. All was well though, the park people faxed my document to the bank people who were then able to complete the transfer. Now I understand why I saw so many hotels and guest houses OUTSIDE the park, after I left! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1144" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1144" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707353.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707353.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707353.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707353.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> No elephants my first day, so I went out with my bike and my headlamp to do some night spotting of critters. Saw this blindsnake&#8230;. cool! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1145" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1145" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707354.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707354.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707354.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707354.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Exotic thai porcupine </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1146" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1146" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707355.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707355.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707355.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181707355.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418170735.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Cool moth&#8230; I saw this guy b/c its little eyes were glowing bright orange with my headlamp. A good bright headlamp is worth sooo much&#8230;. I have the PrincetonTec Apex II, highly recommended. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> What are you staring at. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1151" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1151" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171055.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171055.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171055.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Funny thai versions of familiar junk food. Didn&#8217;t actually try these so I can&#8217;t tell how delicious they were. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1152" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1152" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710551.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710551.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710551.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710551.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I biked out of the park, and stayed at place 15km outside the park, called Greenleaf Guesthouse. The people were nice, they had a good restaurant, rooms were cheap, and they led cave tours and hikes/drives in the park. I went on the afternoon cave trip and was planning to leave the next day. The cave trip was so cool though, that I stayed for the park visit the next day too. This is a tarantula living in the cave we visited. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I think this was called a spider scorpion&#8230;. anyhow, it was a gnarly arachnid. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1154" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1154" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710553.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710553.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710553.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710553.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Centipede love </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1155" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1155" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710554.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710554.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710554.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710554.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Sparkly temple we saw on the drive from the cave to the field where we waited to see the mass bat exodus&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1156" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1156" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710555.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710555.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710555.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710555.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This was one of the coolest things I&#8217;ve ever seen&#8230;. my first murmuration! See that fuzzy black line across the sky, above the red sky? Those are bats! There are about 3 million of them, and they leave the cave to find food every night around sunset. It takes over an hour for 3 million bats to leave the cave. Our guide had calculated the average bats per second&#8230;. I think it was 50-something. So amazing. I have a video of this too, but I&#8217;m sure if you look up &#8220;Khao Yai bat cave&#8221; on youtube you can see it. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1157" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1157" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710556.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710556.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710556.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181710556.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171055.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Red headed lantern flies&#8230; definitely the wildest looking hemipterans I&#8217;ve ever seen! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1158" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1158" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171303.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171303.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171303.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171303.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Taking a break to put on our leech socks for the hike through Khao Yai. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1159" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1159" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713031.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713031.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713031.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713031.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px;
