height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And from wildlife back to humans&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1161" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1161" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713033.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713033.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713033.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713033.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171303.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> green snake, don&#8217;t know what&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1162" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1162" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171304.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171304.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171304.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171304.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Great hornbill </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1163" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1163" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713041.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713041.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713041.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713041.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Flower of a ginger plant </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1164" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1164" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713042.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713042.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713042.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181713042.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171304.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These are actualy insects! Not moss, not a plant virus&#8230; they walked along the branch, and if you touch their little hairs, they come off in a bit of white dust in your fingers. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1165" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1165" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171510.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171510.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171510.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171510.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Scorpion, not the most poisonous one in Thailand. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1166" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1166" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715101.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715101.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715101.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715101.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> So we were driving through the park (6 of us foreigners in the back of a covered pickup truck) and all of a sudden we pulled a U turn and started going really fast&#8230; this was why!!! FINALLY!! The guide had gotten a phonecall from a park ranger telling us that a male was crossing the road. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1167" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1167" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715102.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715102.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715102.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181715102.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171510.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We visited this waterfall in the park after the Elephant alert. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1168" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1168" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171629.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171629.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171629.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418171629.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> As we were driving out of the park, back to the guest house, someone spotted a really big butt. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1169" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1169" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716291.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716291.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716291.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716291.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We pulled over and waited.. we were the only ones on the road at this point. We couldn&#8217;t believe it.. TWO elephants in one day! It was another male, just hanging in the brush, eating&#8230; we waited 15 min or so and then he decided to cross the street, right behind our truck. So exciting. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1170" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1170" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716292.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716292.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716292.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181716292.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418171629.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Guardrails&#8230; aint no thang. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>After the park, I made up a route to Bangkok that took me through Lopburi and Ayutthaya, both former Thai capitals. Navigation was fun because Thai roads are so awesome&#8230; even the small ones are well paved. I&#8217;d play a game where I had to reach the next town on the smallest roads possible, without getting stuck in mud pits or non-existant roads (GPSs are good for this). Super fun, and it made the hot kilometers tick by really fast compared to the slog through Cambodia.</p>
<p>Lopburi is a small town known for the monkeys that run around the streets. I didn&#8217;t spend much time here, but it had a few nice wats and Angkor-style temple ruins. And there were monkeys, all over. Sadly, the most salient memory I have from this town is witnessing a horrible display of domestic violence, in broad daylight. A lesbian couple was arguing across the street, and one (very large) woman stood over her partner and was beating her on the head and face repeatedly, and yelling really loudly. A little boy was with them.</p>
<p>There were people all around, but no one seemed to pay any attention. I stood and watched with bystander paralysis, incredulous that this was actually happening right next to me. I didn&#8217;t know what to do (How do you call the cops in Thailand?!!), and I don&#8217;t speak Thai, but this needed to stop. I just walked closer to them and stared at the big lady, with all the firey eye-daggers I could muster&#8230;. I pointed at her face (still 6 feet away or more) and said &#8220;Go&#8221;&#8230;. she looked at me and started yelling something in Thai, but stopped beating her girlfriend for a moment so that was ok. They had been traveling together on a motorbike pulling a flat trailer, and eventually the big lady got on the bike and they left together, the smaller woman and little boy in the trailer.</p>
<p>I don&#8217;t know if that was the right thing to do, for a number of reasons, but at that moment nothing mattered except that a person was getting punched in the head. I didn&#8217;t know them or their story, but there&#8217;s no justification in the world for what I saw to continue. So that&#8217;s why I got all up in their business. After they left, I walked into a park and couldn&#8217;t help but start to cry. A few street vendors who had seen the episode came over and gave me a bottle of water, and they called over a lady who speaks English to talk with me about it.</p>
<p>I don&#8217;t know what was worse, seeing the woman get beaten, or what this &#8220;interpreter&#8221; told me. Basically she said, &#8220;Oh, they&#8217;re lesbians and they do this every day. It wasn&#8217;t a guy beating her, don&#8217;t worry. They&#8217;ll go home and make love and everything will be fine. She was yelling at you to mind your own business.&#8221;</p>
<p>This made me feel ill, and it was all I could do to keep from crying more, or opening a very large can of human-rights-flavored worms in limited English. I thanked her for talking with me about it, bought a consolation bubble tea, and walked back to my hotel.</p>

height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Most of the Buddhas at Wat Mahathat are missing their heads from the Burmese invasion where the statues were defaced (beheaded?) </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1186" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1186" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743373.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418174337.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743373.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743373.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743373.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418174337.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The one intact Buddha. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1187" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1187" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743374.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418174337.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743374.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743374.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181743374.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418174337.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One of the prangs at Wat Mahathat&#8230; Deja Vu from Angkor Wat, no? </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1188" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1188" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418174420.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418174420.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418174420.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418174420.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418174420.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418174420.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I took a train the rest of the way into Bangkok, and had to grab a small ferry to reach the train station in Ayutthaya. Amphibibike! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>I spent about 4 days in Bangkok and had a great time. I wish I had been able to stay a bit longer. I binged on street food. I got to reconnect with Soraya, a friend from my lab at Cornell, who is now a professor at Mahidol University in BKK. So good catch up! I visited Jacky at Probike and got my bike box, and got to have dinner with him and his family. His wife made some amazing Thai food, and Jacky kindly put me in touch with some bike shop friends in India, where I am now.</p>
<p>I also went walking through Lumphini park, which I didn&#8217;t realize had just become the headquarters of the famous Bangkok protesters who want to see the prime minister step down so that a fair election can take place.</p>
<p>The Lumphini park protester camp was like a mini city&#8230;. 300,000 people camped in tents. It was the most highly organized tent city I have ever seen, and from a public health standpoint was pretty impressive. The city actually set up temporary showers and toilets, and took care of trash services for the park. There were free water and food stations, and volunteer medical services. The park was split up into sub-neighborhoods according to where in Thailand you are from. If you want to move your tent to another area, you have to register with a new sub-group.</p>
<p>As I was walking through the park taking pictures, I met a woman named Sophia who is Thai, but lives in San Francisco. Her brother is involved in the protest, and she was there visiting their family. She took me on a tour of the park, showed me her tent, and introduced me to a few of her friends who were working security for the protest movement. It was awesome to be able to talk with her in English and ask all sorts of questions about what&#8217;s going on there. At the time I visited, the place was really calm, not much going on. I got a bit worried at one point, when I learned that four protesters had been shot as they were driving toward the capital (far from Lumphini park, but still I didn&#8217;t know if there would be a response). Everything was fine&#8230;. it felt like a big lazy block party.</p>
<p>The more time I spent talking with Sophia, the more complicated her personal story got about why she was back in Thailand, why she was camped in a tent here, and when she would go back to her family in San Francisco. The short version is that her brother had stolen her passport, making her cancel her flight back to the US, and effectively grounding her in Bangkok. A few times I was walking with her around the park, she would go find her brother and try to convince him to give it back to her. He wouldn&#8217;t do it. I even went with her to visit the Buddhist monk whom she asked for advice on the whole situation. He was a smiley old guy, but I don&#8217;t think he told her what she wanted to hear. I still don&#8217;t think I know half the whole story or if what I do know is true, but I felt awful for her and wished there was something I could do. She hadn&#8217;t seen her husband or her kids since November.</p>

height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1195" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1195" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181748502.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418174850.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181748502.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181748502.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181748502.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418174850.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More glitz. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1196" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1196" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175036.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175036.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175036.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Jackie and me at ProBike in Bangkok&#8230; big thanks to him for the bike box, tuneup and delicious homecooked meal. For all your cycling needs in Bangkok&#8230; Probike is in the Siam Square area, just north of Lumphini park. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1197" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1197" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750361.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750361.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750361.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750361.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Cool that BKK has a bike share program </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1205" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1205" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181752401.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175240.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181752401.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181752401.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181752401.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175240.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A rare moment on Rama I street, with minimal traffic. This is the situation in BKK though&#8230; elevated metro tracks and pedestrian covered walkways so you don&#8217;t have to walk through traffic. Bikes get to mix in down below with everyone else&#8230; can be terrifying, but it&#8217;s a cakewalk compared to biking in India (ooh foreshadowing!) </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1201" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1201" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750365.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750365.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750365.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750365.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Because ProBike was right near Lumphini park, I thought I&#8217;d go walking around. This is when I realized I had walked into protester camp headquarters, and I met Sophia and her friend as I was walking around. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1198" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1198" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750362.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750362.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750362.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750362.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The protesters want the prime minister gone (very attractive picture of her on this sign), because they say her nepotism and corruption prevents any fair election from happening. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1199" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1199" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750363.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750363.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750363.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750363.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1200" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1200" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750364.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750364.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750364.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181750364.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175036.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Water station for tent city residents </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1202" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1202" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175153.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175153.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175153.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175153.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175153.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175153.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Protesters at Lumphini park. There was no rally or event going on at this point, just people living in the park. There was a central stage and screen where there was always a speech or presentation going on. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1203" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1203" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181751531.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175153.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181751531.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181751531.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-201404181751531.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175153.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Drinking coffee with Sophia in her sub neighborhood within the park. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1204" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1204" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175240.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175240.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175240.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175240.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175240.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175240.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> If you don&#8217;t have a bicycle, this is the next best way to get around BKK. The motorcycle taxi guys wear vests, their rides are cheaper, and they zip in between the traffic so you can get where you&#8217;re going without the hot sweaty wait in traffic. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1206" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1206" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175318.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140418175318.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175318.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175318.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/wpid-photo-20140418175318.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140418175318.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Packed up and headed out, again&#8230; Great airport experience with Thai Airways. Super nice and no waits (at each of the 4 desks I had to visit in order to check in, check my bike, pay for my bike, and deliver it to the oversized luggage people). </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>So there are my two weeks in Thailand&#8230;. hugely intense moments that punctuated the mostly-dull cycling, which I&#8217;ve begun to view simply as a way to support my bad habit of street food overeating. I had a great time and I realize that my experiences are unique to a wandering bike-tour mode of travel that I won&#8217;t soon be able to repeat. But, I would love to go back to catch the iconic spots I missed. I resolved that I could always go back and visit Chiang Mai, or go diving in the southern islands as a &#8220;regular tourist,&#8221; and this made me feel better as I got tired and bored of the biking routine and the highway hotels.</p>
<p>Next post from Bangalore!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
					</div><!-- .entry -->
					</div><!-- /.middle -->
	<div class="fix"></div>
</div><!-- /.post -->
			
				<div id="post-1116" class="post-1116 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized">

	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/03/30/i-gotta-get-out-of-here-but-i-just-cant-leave/" title="Permalink to I gotta get out of here, but I just can&#8217;t&nbsp;leave&#8230;." rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			March 30, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/03/30/i-gotta-get-out-of-here-but-i-just-cant-leave/#comments">5 Comments</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/03/30/i-gotta-get-out-of-here-but-i-just-cant-leave/" rel="bookmark">I gotta get out of here, but I just can&#8217;t&nbsp;leave&#8230;.</a>
				</h1>

		
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<p>I did eventually leave Cambodia. But while I was in the country, I felt like Cambodia was trying to both fry me out of existence and wrap me in a big dusty hug.</p>
<p>It was the most difficult country to bike in by far&#8230;. 100 degree heat, lots of dust, endless flat landscape, and only a handful of stick-straight roads to choose from. The national highways were recently paved (the major ones were finished in about 2009, and there are still gravel stretches on those), and most other roads are a pretty red sand that&#8217;s great for fishtailing. Long days on the bike (6-7 hours, at my lowly 12-14 mph clip&#8230;) are necessary, because there are huge stretches without places to stay the night, and I ruled out camping because I&#8217;m not hardcore enough to go without a shower out here!</p>
<p>I also have to admit that I pretty much knew all of this going in&#8230;. the few bike blogs out there about Cambodia are either written by crazies who write things like &#8220;puking over my handlebars&#8221; and &#8220;after 150 km, I passed out&#8221;, or people with good intentions who &#8220;put our bikes on the bus, again!&#8221; I didn&#8217;t really want to be either of these, but I think I ended up a little of both.</p>
<p>While Cambodia was trying to kill me, it was also really beautiful, quirky and quiet, and it gave me some of the kindest friends I&#8217;ve met on my trip. As soon as I crossed the border from Vietnam, it was clear I was on my own in a totally new place. No more rice/noodle shacks every 50 feet or whizzing motorbikes&#8230;. it was literally just me on National Highway 2, for a long time. Sometimes there were nice trees lining the sides of the road with nice shade, but often not. When I saw people, they were on bikes or motorcycles or on strange home-built tractor things with big trailers of stuff. Sometimes I saw folks working in the rice fields, but most of the land looked pretty dry. The landscape was flat like Vietnam, but now the Mekong river crossings were gone and there were fewer houses and farm buildings.</p>
<p>It was nice to be so alone, but honestly it got really unnerving too! What if I got thirsty or hungry? Where are all the little roadside stands with cold drinks and funny snacks?? That first day I rode 80 km from Chau Doc, Vietnam to a small town called Takeo, Cambodia, and it was stressful getting there because I had no local money and I did get thirsty. I didn&#8217;t find any money changers at the border, and Takeo is the first town, 60 km later. In Cambodia they use US dollars and Khmer Riel, and all I had were Vietnamese Dong and a $20. I finally found a lady with an orange cooler box on the side of the road, and asked for a bottle of water&#8230;. but she couldn&#8217;t change my $20 and couldn&#8217;t use Vietnamese money. She smiled and just gave me the water&#8230;. what a saint. Looking back, I wish I had just given her the $20 and left. It bothered me for awhile after that, that I didn&#8217;t. Eventually I made it to Takeo, found an ATM, a SIM card and a shower.</p>

I hope those big sacks are filled with foam or something&#8230;. can&#8217;t believe the bikes can even take loads like that! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1039" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1039" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215061.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221506.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215061.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215061.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215061.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221506.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Harvesting the rice&#8230;. I&#8217;m sure I&#8217;ll see those big turquoise bags loaded up on motorcycles and bikes at some point! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1042" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1042" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215491.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221549.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215491.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215491.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215491.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221549.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Sometimes there were trees lining the road from the border to Takeo&#8230;. the shade was always welcome. These bikes were just hanging out alone by the side of the road. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1043" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1043" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215492.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221549.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215492.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215492.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302215492.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221549.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The ride to Takeo was just the emergency I had been saving these for!! Found them in a fancy bakery/candy store in Vietnam. I had 60-70 km to bike from the border to Takeo, and didn&#8217;t have the right money to buy snacks along the way. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1044" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1044" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330221654.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330221654.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330221654.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330221654.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Made it to Takeo! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1045" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1045" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216541.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216541.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216541.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216541.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I visited the market and someone gave me a few of these to try&#8230;. they were delicious! Fried up in soy sauce&#8230;. a little crunchy&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1047" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1047" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216543.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216543.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216543.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216543.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One popular brand of Cambodian beer is called Angkor. Another is called Anchor (pronounced with a &#8220;ch&#8221;). Beer here costs less than a dollar. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1046" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1046" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216542.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216542.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216542.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302216542.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330221654.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I was drinking my Angkor and eating dinner alone, and afterward a bunch of guys from the Electorate of Cambodia handed me another beer and invited me to sit with them. Their buddy holding the chicken leg here is actually Vietnamese and they kept making fun of him. Good times with beer and Khmer flash cards!! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>The next day was another long one, all the way to Phnom Penh&#8230;. my 7th day in a row on the bike before a rest day or two in the city. I was tired and it was hot and gross, but that morning during breakfast I met Venny and his mom, and they completely made my day despite the tough ride. I was struggling to order coffee and breakfast at a roadside cafe, as usual, and they were sitting nearby and helped me with the Khmer (Pronounced &#8220;Kmy&#8221; like &#8220;Km-eye&#8221;) I was trying to learn. We got to talking, and I learned they were in Takeo for an eye Dr. appointment for Venny&#8217;s mom, but that they&#8217;d be heading back to Phnom Penh the same day. Venny speaks enough English that we could actually communicate, and helped me out a lot with some Khmer phrases. So we exchanged phone numbers and facebooks (everyone in the world has FB, btw), and they passed me a few times on the motorbike on the way to P.P. When I got there, they ended up inviting me to dinner at their house! The next set of photos is from Phnom Penh, including a harrowing visit to Cheung Ek, or one of the main Killing Fields sites near P.P. I&#8217;ll describe this better in the photo captions.</p>
