height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> It was exciting to have a navigational decision to make! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1050" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1050" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221592.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221592.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221592.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221592.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I stopped every hour or so (20 km) for a cold drink and some shade. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1049" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1049" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221591.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221591.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221591.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221591.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is how things look when I&#8217;d stop&#8230; Use the Khmer phrase list to try to order some ice coffee with just a little milk. Success this time! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1051" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1051" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221593.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221593.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221593.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302221593.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222159.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pretty entrances to wats, neighborhoods and schools along the road. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1052" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1052" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222315.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222315.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222315.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222315.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222315.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222315.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> About 10 km outside Phnom Penh, the road turned to a dusty mess. Looked like it had been under construction for awhile. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1053" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1053" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222339.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222339.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222339.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222339.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Street food papaya salad&#8230; a delicious recipe for diarrhea for sure. Not for me though&#8230; I eat street food with reckless abandon since the doxycycline for malara prophylaxis is protective against some enteric bugs too. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1054" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1054" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223391.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223391.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223391.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223391.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fish curry </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1055" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1055" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223392.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223392.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223392.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223392.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A Khmer dessert, called &#8220;Pnk&#8217;aym&#8221;&#8230; this stuff is amazing. You pick 2 or 3 things, like mung beans, red beans, jellies, or pumpkin, and the vendor combines them in a bowl and pours sweetened coconut milk and ice over it. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1056" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1056" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223393.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223393.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223393.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302223393.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222339.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> From the back of the tuktuk I rode to get out to Cheung Ek, the killing fields memorial site near Phnom Penh. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1057" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1057" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222454.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222454.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222454.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is one of only a few photos I could stand to take here. Cheung Ek is where the Khmer Rouge brought the &#8220;city people&#8221; &#8211; intellectuals, professionals, even people with glasses who looked smart &#8211; to be mass-murdered during the genocide from 1974-1978. The landscape is full of shallow grassy depressions, some covered with roofs like the one here, to honor the dead. People were taken from their homes in trucks, and bludgeoned to death before falling into the mass grave pits. This all happened at night, to the soundtrack of diesel generators and patriotic music so people nearby didn&#8217;t know what was going on. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1058" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1058" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224541.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224541.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224541.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224541.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Although many of the remains have been exhumed in order to learn who had been killed and how, pieces of bone and cloth still come to the surface, especially after the rainy season. I saw a few pieces of bone on the ground as I was walking. The staff at Cheung Ek collect these,and some are put in glass boxes that you can see during the self-guided audio tour. This piece of jaw was on one of the boxes of bones. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1059" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1059" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224542.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224542.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224542.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224542.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This memorial stupa was built to honor all those who were murdered. Inside are 9000 skulls. The main Khmer Rouge leaders are still in the process of trial for war crimes, and their leader Pol Pot was able to live out his life after fleeing to Thailand. He was married again after the genocide, was wealthy, and died of a heart attack in his 80s. The audio tour was really well done and reverently spoken&#8230; there were stories of survivors and Khmer Rouge members alike. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1060" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1060" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224543.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224543.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224543.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224543.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I was glad to be able to visit Venny and his family after the Cheung Ek visit. We sat and talked a long time, and I learned that he has had tetanus! He hadn&#8217;t had the vaccine, so was violently sick for two weeks. During that time he said he had to &#8220;be a monk&#8221; for two weeks, and stay in the Pogodas to pray for healing. He has 3 sisters, one of whom lives in Michigan with his dad. His mom lived in the US for a year or so, but came back after her visa wasn&#8217;t renewed. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1061" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1061" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224544.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224544.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224544.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224544.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Venny&#8217;s mom and sister Muoyheak, with the delicious dinner they made! Green beans, ginger fish, pickled cabbage&#8230; so good. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1062" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1062" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224545.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224545.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224545.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224545.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> What Phnom in Phnom penh. I like the Nagas (snake heads) that protect the temples here. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1063" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1063" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224546.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224546.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224546.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224546.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This guy was selling good luck birds. You buy one and then let it go. I totally did it. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1064" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1064" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224547.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224547.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224547.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224547.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is a spirit house&#8230; it&#8217;s hard to tell, but it&#8217;s about 2 x 3 feet andup on a pedestal. It&#8217;s a place for the spirits to live if they&#8217;re still here. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1065" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1065" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224548.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224548.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224548.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302224548.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222454.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Always take your shoes off before going in the temple. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1066" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1066" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222813.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222813.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330222813.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The national museum </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1067" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1067" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228131.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228131.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228131.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228131.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Flowers at the national museum </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1068" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1068" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228132.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228132.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228132.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228132.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I had dinner at a restaurant called Lotus Blanc, which is a training program for disadvantaged kids to get training in the hospitality industry. I was the only one there when I got there! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1069" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1069" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228133.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228133.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228133.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228133.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Students having a brief meeting&#8230; they had just finished a year of coursework and had just started their practical restaurant training. It was really cute and awkward&#8230; they were nervous and excited about everything and I felt like someone was watching me the whole time I ate. Couldn&#8217;t put my glass down without someone coming over to ask if I wanted more! They are selected for the program by an application, and then the school pays their parents in rice, to make up for the lost productivity from having their son/daughter in school and not working at home. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1070" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1070" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228134.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228134.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228134.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302228134.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330222813.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And the food was really good! This is a chicken banana flower salad I ordered. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>After taking a few days off in P.P., I felt better but wasn&#8217;t ready for another week of long, hot Cambodian biking. I bought a bus ticket to bypass the dust and traffic of the city, and start my way west toward Siem Reap and Thailand. This way, I still had a few days to bike, but they could be shorter days and I&#8217;d have some time to hang out at Angkor Wat in Siem Reap, before biking another couple days to the Thai border.</p>
<p>The same day I bought the bus ticket, Venny called and said he was going south to the coast town of Kampot for the weekend with a couple of friends, and wanted me to go along. I said I&#8217;d just bought a bus ticket and that I didn&#8217;t think I could, but really appreciated the invite. He paused, and said &#8220;I really want you to go, you go to Siem Reap later?&#8221;</p>
<p>It was already 10pm, I was planning to wake up at 5 to catch my bus north, and follow the plan of moving a bit quicker through and out of the country. But I didn&#8217;t have a good reason to say no to the invitation&#8230;. who&#8217;s &#8220;schedule&#8221; am I on here?! In Bonder-land, there is no schedule! Much as I really just wanted to leave the heat and the dust, I said &#8220;of course I can go later. Seeya in Kampot in two days.&#8221;</p>
<p>It&#8217;s been so nice to have a good friend my age and to speak a little English, and I was tired of the grind of biking alone every day. So I stayed up another few hours, looking at maps and trying to figure out how to get down to Kampot for the weekend, and then back up to Siem Reap, without spending the ENTIRE time on a bus. I wanted to bike, just not insane distances every day. I woke up early, changed my bus ticket from going north to going south, and got off on the side of the road about 70 km from Kampot. It was hot and gross, but I set the Garmin route destination to &#8220;Kampot pie and ice cream palace&#8221; (I kid you not! ICE CREAM PALACE!!), and got my ride on.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/03\/30\/i-gotta-get-out-of-here-but-i-just-cant-leave\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1071" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1071" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224032.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224032.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224032.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I bussed about halfway to Kampot, and then asked to be dropped off on the side of the road in order to bike the last 70 km or so. Here&#8217;s a pic of another Khmer roadside wedding&#8230; these were awesome, always a lot of music, decorations and people in fancy dresses. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1072" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1072" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240321.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240321.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240321.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240321.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Students out biking to/from school </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1073" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1073" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240322.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240322.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240322.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240322.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Example of a house along National Hwy 3, between Phnom Penh and Kampot&#8230; I think they&#8217;re lifted to keep the snakes and rats out, and the rain during the wet season. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1074" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1074" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240323.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240323.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240323.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240323.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Sometimes kids would ride with me for a little while. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1075" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1075" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240324.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240324.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240324.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302240324.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224032.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Spirit houses for sale! Pick your spirits&#8217; favorite color! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1076" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1076" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224141.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224141.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224141.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224141.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224141.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224141.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fresh pressed cane palm juice&#8230; I made myself go a whole hour before I could stop for one of these icy beverages. Or three. If course I had water in my water bottles, but it was hot water after only a few minutes so I made a lot of short stops for cold drinks. These kids were cute, and helped me practice some Khmer. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1077" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1077" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302241411.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224141.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302241411.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302241411.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302241411.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224141.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Loaded up motorbikes, headed into the village. Another pic from the bikeride into the southern coastal town of Kampot. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1078" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1078" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224241.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224241.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224241.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I arrived in Kampot on a thursday, and Venny and his friend Dara met me there on friday afternoon. The first thing we did was to head down to the park by the river for a proper photo shoot. These guys were clearly pros at taking and starring in the pics! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1079" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1079" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242411.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242411.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242411.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242411.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I think we took more selfies this one weekend than I have on the whole trip&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1080" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1080" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242412.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242412.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242412.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242412.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Kampot photo shoot </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1081" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1081" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242413.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242413.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242413.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242413.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> There&#8217;s one &#8220;mountain&#8221; in this area, called Bokor mountain (a little less than 1000 m elevation). The next day, I rented a motorbike and the four of us headed up to Bokor. There were 4 of us because Venny and Dara&#8217;s other coworker and friend Lin came to join. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1082" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1082" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242414.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242414.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242414.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242414.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Headed to Bokor on the motorbikes&#8230; it was so nice to feel a cool breeze, even a small elevation gain made a big difference. Pretty roadside flowers too. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1083" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1083" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242415.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242415.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242415.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302242415.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224241.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We stopped to pray at the shrine on the way. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1084" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1084" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224500.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224500.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140330224500.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After our trip up to Bokor mountain, we rested awhile and then took the motorbikes half hour east, to the coastal town of Kep. Kep is famous for its seafood and the pepper (like peppercorns) that is grown there. When we arrived, we stopped at the market and bought some shrimp and crabs right out of the water. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1085" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1085" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245001.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245001.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245001.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245001.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Rinsing the shrimp. A kilo of shrimp and a kilo of crabs cost about $10 total, and the ladies at the market boil them up for you in a salty stock. We took these to the beach and had a sunset seafood picnic! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1086" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1086" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245002.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245002.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245002.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245002.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Venny helping me pick out some Kep peppercorns to bring home. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1087" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1087" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245003.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245003.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245003.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245003.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Excited about the seafood picnic! Oh yeah, and another photo shoot. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1088" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1088" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245004.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245004.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245004.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403302245004.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140330224500.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After the seafood picnic, we went for a swim in the bay, and then stopped at a resort that was hosting a free concert. I&#8217;d heard about this from another American named Galen, who I met on the bus from Phnom Penh. The band was the &#8220;Cambodian Space Project&#8221; and they&#8217;re hilarious&#8230; look em up on youtube, they;re kind of B-52-esque. My favorite song is &#8220;Have visa, no have rice.&#8221; This is a pic from the outdoor concert&#8230; Dara, Galen, Me and Venny. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>So glad I changed my plans and went south for the weekend instead of north as planned! After an awesome weekend of Khmer music videos, riverside photo shoots and a crab boil, I bit the bullet and spent 12 awful hours on a bus back to P.P. and then all the way to Siem Reap. I splurged on a $25 hotel with a nice room, AC and a pool, and had fun biking all around the Angkor Archaeological site, looking at all the Wats. Found some bubble tea in town too&#8230; whew!!</p>
<p>Just a quick blurb here about Angkor and the Wats, for anyone else out there like me who&#8217;s heard of it but didn&#8217;t really know much else besides &#8220;It&#8217;s ancient.&#8221; This is mostly thanks to a visitor&#8217;s guidebook I picked up at my schwank hotel.</p>
<p>So the Khmer empire was really powerful (in military, economics and culture) between the 9-12th centuries AD across Cambodia, and much of Vietnam, Thailand and Laos. Angkor was the capital of the empire. During these centuries, a number of Kings reined (7 of them were named Jayavarman, with numbers I-VII to tell them apart!) and built huge temples with big moats and elaborate systems to carry water. The reasons for having temples varied&#8230;. to honor gods or the Buddha, to have a central point for a city, or a place to be buried and have your royal funeral.</p>
<p>There are over 45 temples (Wats) in the Angkor area, and they&#8217;re spread out over about 50km (Although the biggest and most famous dozen or so are concentrated in probably a 5 km radius). These were built at different times by different kings, and my favorite part was how the dominant religion changed a few times between Hinduism and Buddhism (early Indian influence brought Hinduism to the area). Early temples built to honor the Buddha were sometimes defaced a century later, when Hinduism made a brief comeback. You can see Buddhas that were &#8220;fixed&#8221; to look like Boddhisatvas or other Hindu figures, and in one place, they just put a big &#8220;stupa&#8221; that looks like a unicorn horn in the central shrine of the Wat. Just couldn&#8217;t agree on who should be sculpted there&#8230;.?!</p>
<p>Anyhow, Angkor Wat is the most famous of the temples and is considered the &#8220;best&#8221; architecturally (not sure by what measures&#8230;). It was built in the mid-12th century during the height of Angkorian influence. The other temples are cool too though, and sometimes I could really see the differences in styles among the kings who built them. For example, there was one king after the guy who built Angkor Wat who built a bunch of other wats, really quickly. His style includes large stone faces, and is generally more sloppy and less detailed than previous kings. It was cool to see those hallmarks of thoughts and preferences held by guys who have been dead for so long.</p>
<p>I think biking is definitely a great way to visit the Wats&#8230;.. the roads get a bit jammed with tuktuks and tour vans. Just be sure you go early in the morning or you&#8217;ll be way too hot to want to see another wat!!</p>
