height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Hanh is an entrepreneur, and among other things, she runs a car rental business from the parking lot of a condo she is renovating (but doesn&#8217;t live in currently). Her condo unit is the one painted all white&#8230;. in the center next to the one with green shutters. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1034" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1034" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314123634.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314123634.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314123634.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314123634.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314123634.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314123634.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> You know there is little hope when google translates someones ideas to &#8220;shrink defenders&#8221; and &#8220;whipping child stars&#8221;. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=975" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="975" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090122.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090122.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090122.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090122.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090122.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090122.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Besides eating Pho, the next important stereotypic activity I did in Vietnam was to get a pedicure. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=977" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="977" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090242.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090242.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090242.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090242.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One of each, please. From left to right, top to bottom: Jackfruit, Sapodilla (my favorite!!), papaya, [forgot name, tart crunchy fruit], mango, and watermelon. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=978" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="978" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902421.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902421.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902421.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902421.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I was captivated by the streets/traffic in Saigon&#8230;.. the streets were simultaneously empty, but frighteningly chaotic. There were almost zero cars, just motorbikes and bicycles which take up little physical space. So the streets didn&#8217;t look full, but people would fly into intersections from all directions without stopping which created the illusion of &#8220;someone is going to die here, at this moment.&#8221; This fortunately didn&#8217;t happen, at least while I was watching!! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=979" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="979" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902422.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902422.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902422.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140902422.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090242.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Coolest bike in Saigon&#8230;.. check out the rainbow spokes!!! Best part, I saw more than one of these beauties around town. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=981" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="981" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090527.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090527.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090527.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090527.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090527.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090527.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Watching my spicy street food in the making. My strategy is to hover sketchily while the person makes food for someone else. Then, if I think it looks good, I point, smile, and ask how much. This was delicious&#8230;. rice noodles, shaved green mango, crunchy dried fish, fish sauce, lime, cilantro and other goodies I don&#8217;t know the names of. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=982" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="982" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090546.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090546.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090546.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090546.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> It took about 15 minutes for me to ask and figure out just what exactly these were (different kind of fish balls), and whether they needed to be cooked or not (no). Delicious. And yep, that&#8217;s my empty cup of bubble tea in the foreground. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=983" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="983" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140905461.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090546.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140905461.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140905461.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140905461.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090546.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The same place sold raw skewered foods that were cooked infront of you on the table. Also delicious. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1030" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1030" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314103716.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314103716.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314103716.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314103716.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314103716.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314103716.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is TinTin, a friend I met who helped me buy a Vietnamese SIM card for my phone. He invited me to eat Banh Xeo and take a spin around the city on his motorbike. So nice! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1031" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1031" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141037161.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314103716.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141037161.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141037161.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141037161.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314103716.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Traffic jam, from the back of a motorbike downtown Saigon. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>After 3 days in Saigon, I headed out early on the bike, westward across the Mekong delta. I knew it would be hot, but entirely flat so I went almost 100km the first day.  I biked every day for 7 days (crossed the Cambodian border on day 6), and spent the night in Ben Tre, Vinh Long, Can Tho, Long Xuyen and Chau Doc. You can see the route at <a href="https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike">https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike</a>.  The tour is ON! Not messing around!  Haha it actually worked well to stay in a new place each night&#8230;. I&#8217;d bike 4-6 hours in the morning, and arrive to a new place in time for lunch, a shower, sink laundry, and some town exploration. This photo set gives a few highlights of the short but fun Tour de Delta.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/03\/14\/tour-de-mekong-delta\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="239" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=984" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="984" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090621.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090621.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090621.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314090621.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Early breakfast Pho in an alley on the way out of Saigon </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=985" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="985" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906211.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906211.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906211.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906211.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Silly me, thinking I&#8217;d &#8220;beat the traffic&#8221; by leaving at 7am. Biking with all the motos was actually really fun&#8230;. kind of like real life mariokart. The lack of cars and similar speed of the motos and bikes made it more exciting and less scarier. Definitely less scary than being a pedestrian trying to cross the river of crazy moto traffic. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=986" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="986" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906212.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906212.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906212.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140906212.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314090621.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Almost everyone on a motorbike wears a facemask, and they come in zillions of colors and patterns. I broke down and bought one after about 3 hours, for protection from sun, dust and exhaust. Yeeah, bringin sexy back. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=987" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="987" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314092548.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314092548.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314092548.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Roads in Vietnam are in great shape, and they seem to love big suspension bridges. The cool thing about biking the Mekong delta is you get to cross tons of bridges every day, big and small. Helps keep the scenery interesting, in an otherwise flat landscape. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=988" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="988" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925481.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925481.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925481.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925481.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> That&#8217;s one big river&#8230;. this is the &#8220;main&#8221; Mekong river (does that even exist down here?), a view from the suspension bridge on the way to Ben Tre the first day. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=989" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="989" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925482.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925482.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925482.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925482.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pile of durians at sunset. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=990" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="990" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925483.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925483.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925483.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925483.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Meet the Rambutan, spikey and red on the outside, soft and juicy in the middle. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=991" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="991" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925484.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925484.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925484.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140925484.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092548.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> To navigate across the delta, I&#8217;ve been using OpenStreetMaps, which has been awesome (leaves Garminn maps in the dust). On the route from Ben Tre to Vinh Long, the bike directions sent me on a lovely shady road, just big enough for motos and bikes. As I was riding, two people stopped me and (I think) were telling me I should turn around, and go back to the main road. One guy held up an open palm, and pointed his other finger straight into it&#8230;. this seemed to signal &#8220;dead end.&#8221; I said thanks, but kept going&#8230;. I really liked this road, and the map said that it would meeet another larger road in only 10 km. If they&#8217;re right, I could turn around without losing much ground or time. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=993" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="993" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927511.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927511.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927511.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927511.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I enjoyed the shady quiet road thoroughly, and then came to the best dead end ever! Literally, the road led straight off this dock. While I stood there looking around and thinking of what to do, a little ferry pulled up and I got on. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=994" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="994" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927512.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927512.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927512.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927512.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The boat took me across to the other side of the river (Open Street maps didn&#8217;t show this particular Mekong tributary&#8230;.), and I hoped really hard that the nice road would just continue over on this side. Or, that the ferry would hang out to take me back. One of the two&#8230;. please! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=995" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="995" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927513.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927513.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927513.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927513.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Everything turned out great, I found the continuation of the road close to the ferry dock, and kept following the OSM route just as before. Crossed some cool little bridges along the way, like this one. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=996" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="996" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927514.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927514.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927514.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927514.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The Mekong delta is the &#8220;rice basket&#8221; of SE Asia, and I saw lots of other agriculture as well. One thing I miss is being able to ask &#8220;what is being grown here?&#8221;, I phrase I used a lot in S. America. I saw so much that I wanted to learn about, but couldn&#8217;t ask. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=997" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="997" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927515.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927515.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927515.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140927515.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314092751.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> An example of a house along the small road&#8230;. I saw a big variety of homes and shelters. From palm-roofed shacks to brightly colored french-style estates with pillars. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=998" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="998" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314095809.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314095809.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314095809.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These guys made me smile. I&#8217;m getting better at snapping covert photos while biking. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=999" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="999" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958091.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958091.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958091.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958091.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On a big ferry boat on the way to Vinh Long&#8230;. made me feel like I was back in Seattle! Except, no cars just motorbikes and bikes. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1000" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1000" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958092.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958092.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958092.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958092.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Hotel bang-for-buck in Vietnam is WAY better than in S. America&#8230;. this place was $12! That&#8217;s a tea set on the dresser, and there&#8217;s AC plus a shower water heater (not that I needed hot water!). For the same price in S. America, things look quite a bit different. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1001" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1001" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958093.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958093.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958093.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958093.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> At the market in Vinh Long&#8230;. lots of mystery desserts that incorporate gelatin or agar or some kind. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1002" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1002" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958094.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958094.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958094.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958094.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pretty beans </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1003" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1003" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958095.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958095.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958095.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403140958095.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314095809.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Vinh Long street market. Notice the floral print matching pantsuit&#8230;. this was a major women&#8217;s fashion trend in Vietnam. All different kinds of printed fabrics, made into the same style of matching top and pants. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1004" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1004" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100151.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100151.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100151.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100151.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I bought some banana &#8220;wine&#8221; at a stall along the road, and decided to have a little while enjoying the sunset. I should&#8217;ve looked at the %ABV, bc this was more like banana whiskey. I did not like it! I later tried mixing it into a fruit smoothie which was good, but I ended up giving the bottle away to the smoothie vendor lady. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1005" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1005" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001511.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001511.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001511.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001511.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Flying kites </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1006" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1006" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001512.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001512.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001512.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001512.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I always had good bike company while riding, and most folks rode something that looked like this. French, cruiser-looking bikes, all silver (except that rainbow one in saigon&#8230;.). The wheels are all radially laced, so the spokes don&#8217;t cross at all. This pattern is not very strong at all, so I was extra impressed when I&#8217;d see people riding bikes completely loaded down with wood or bags of rice. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1007" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1007" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001513.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001513.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001513.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141001513.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100151.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Vermicelli bowl breakfast before heading out for the day. Next stop was Can Tho, the largest city in the Mekong, and 4th largest in Vietnam. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1008" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1008" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100401.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100401.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100401.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100401.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100401.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100401.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I arrived in Can Tho before noon, and so my hotel room wasn&#8217;t ready yet. So I went to the riverfront and grabbed a boat tour through the small canals and floating market. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1009" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1009" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100402.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100402.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100402.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100402.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100402.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100402.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Thuy, my skilled and fearless captain! It was just the two of us, and she took me all around. It was nice to see the delta from the water instead of from the road for awhile. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1010" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1010" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141004021.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100402.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141004021.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141004021.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141004021.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100402.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A house along one of the windy canals. Note the pipes carrying wastewater out to the river </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1015" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1015" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100713.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100713.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100713.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100713.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-20140314100713.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100713.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; This guy decorates my bike now, along with a bracelet she made me out of the same thing. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1014" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1014" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141005352.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100535.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141005352.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141005352.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141005352.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100535.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My favorite house from the boat tour&#8230;. I llove the rainbow roof!!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1016" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1016" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141007131.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100713.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141007131.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141007131.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141007131.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100713.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I met some Americans for the first time in Vietnam at the hotel in Can Tho&#8230;. Caitlin and Carly are PhD students in geography, from Madison!! I got about an hour late start in the morning since it was so fun talking with them&#8230;. they were doing field work for a project on climate impacts on rice paddy production. We had a few friends/colleagues in common so it was fun to geek out for a while. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px;
