Found another little ferry and went across to see. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1020" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1020" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009023.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009023.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009023.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009023.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Yes! So glad to have a good set of maps. The parallel road was small, quiet, and I got to sit and have an ice coffee with some nice women along the way. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1021" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1021" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009024.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009024.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009024.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009024.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On this road, traffic jams could be described as &#8220;cute&#8221; and &#8220;not annoying.&#8221; I like those kinds of traffic jams best. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1022" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1022" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009025.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009025.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009025.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009025.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Looking back over to the major road, with all of its busses and large honkey vehicles. But, the little road ended and (luckily) there was another ferry to get me back across after a nice 10km break. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1023" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1023" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009026.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009026.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009026.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009026.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back to the main road&#8230;. I&#8217;m not sure what these colorful stones were, drying in the sun&#8230;. looked like aquarium rock to me but I didn&#8217;t investigate very closely. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1024" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1024" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009027.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009027.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009027.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141009027.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314100902.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> At one point, I started hearing a loud voice speaking in Vietnamese and realized it was coming from speakers like this one, every 100 yards or so. Again, I wanted to ask someone &#8220;who is talking, and what are they saying?&#8221; But that would have been too advanced a conversation to entrust to google translate. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1026" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1026" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012021.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012021.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012021.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012021.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Last day in Vietnam, going from Chau Doc across the border to Takeo in Cambodia. I took another quiet parallel road and enjoyed the combination of good pavement plus no traffic, with plentiful ice coffee stands along the way. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1027" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1027" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012022.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012022.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012022.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012022.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Last Vietnamese ice coffee. When I stopped here, there were about 4 people, a few playing pool and one woman who couldn&#8217;t seem to stop laughing, at me, or whatever was so funny! Funny flashcard-mediated conversation ensued, and by the time I left, I realized that there were now about a dozen people hanging out there. They were good sports and rallied for a photo. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1028" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1028" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012023.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012023.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012023.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012023.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is the view of the old, closed and decrepit bridge that Open Street Maps directed me to, in order to reach the Cambodian border. After a half hour of wandering, asking and google mapping, I found the new, big, actual bridge that leads to the border. The photo was taken from the correct bridge. OSM fail&#8230;. really sad! I marked the spot so I could submit an edit, when I figure out how to do that. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=1029" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="1029" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012024.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012024.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012024.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/wpid-photo-201403141012024.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-20140314101202.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After a few stamps and overpaying the visa fee by $5, this lovely landscape welcomed me to Cambodia. (@#$^&amp; border guards&#8230;. I argued and said the fee was $20, but he said &#8220;here it&#8217;s $25.&#8221; I just paid, instead of finding the official government website that says $20 and showing it to him. Me 0, government corruption 1. Sigh). </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>And less than a week later, I rode into Cambodia where I still am now.  It was a short time in Vietnam, and I&#8217;d love to go back and see more of the country, especially the northern mountains and costal areas.   But, I&#8217;m looking forward to getting  similar glimpses of Cambodia and Thailand too.  Cambodia has been a completely different experience so far, despite being a nextdoor neighbor.  I&#8217;ll save that for the next post!!!</p>
					</div><!-- .entry -->
					</div><!-- /.middle -->
	<div class="fix"></div>
</div><!-- /.post -->
			
				<div id="post-879" class="post-879 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized tag-philippines">

	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/02/26/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep/" title="Permalink to The Philippines: 3 weeks of family, fish and fear of death by&nbsp;jeep" rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			February 26, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/02/26/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep/#comments">4 Comments</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/02/26/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep/" rel="bookmark">The Philippines: 3 weeks of family, fish and fear of death by&nbsp;jeep</a>
				</h1>

		
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<p>Compared to over 2 months in Ecuador, three weeks in the Philippines felt lightning fast (I leave for Vietnam tomorrow).  It was fast, but Ed and I filled it with so much fun and variety of experiences that bang for buck was definitely had!</p>
<p>Yep, I said &#8220;Ed and I&#8221;&#8230;. Ed arrived a few days before I did, and we got to spend 11 days together, scuba diving, night-bus riding, and visiting the Filipino family he had never met before.  As y&#8217;all know, Ed is Filipino and first generation American.  His parents met in San Francisco after having moved from different parts of the Philippines (PIs for short; his mom&#8217;s family is from around Manila, and his dad&#8217;s is from the mountains, in the Ifugao province). But, his parents have siblings, nieces/nephews, cousins, and children from previous marriages who live here and who have never met their nephew/uncle/brother.  For Ed, this trip was a pilgrimage, and it was pretty stinkin special for me to be there for all of the first-time meetings (and there were tons&#8230;. Ed&#8217;s definitely related to the whole town of Banaue. More on that in pics!).</p>
<p>First thing after I arrived (Ed had already been here 2 days, hanging with family), we hit the ground running&#8230;. south to Batangas and Anilao where we spend 2 days Scuba diving.  Thanks to my dad for the gift of Scuba lessons, I finished my certification here, instead of in frigid Puget Sound.  This part of the Philippines is like the Amazon rainforest of coral reefs&#8230;. huge coral diversity along with all the big stuff!  Ed has an underwater camera but I don&#8217;t have all the goods as of this moment&#8230;. for underwater pics, either scroll down a bit to my second dive trip, or keep an eye on Ed&#8217;s facebook page for some sweet video footage and pics.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/02\/26\/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=846" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="846" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-6-2014-1157-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-6-2014-1157-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-6-2014-1157-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-6-2014-1157-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-6-2014-1157-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-6-2014-1157-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Riding in the Barangay van after hitting the ground! In the front are Inte and Kel&#8230;. two fantastic guys who are not only family, but took us all around Manila in style. This van is sort of like a pickup truck with a covered bed and benches. There was a big sunroof where I could get a face full of Manila smog, along with a lay of the land&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=847" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="847" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1202-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-7-2014-1202-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1202-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1202-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1202-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-7-2014-1202-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> View from the sunroof! Manila is THE densest city in the world (thanks, wikipedia) with over 110,000 people per square mile. Traffic is horrendus, and much of the traffic is made of these old school, chromed-out diesel jeep-busses, called &#8220;Jeepneys.&#8221; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=848" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="848" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1201-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-7-2014-1201-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-7-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-7-2014-1201-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Drivin the Jeepney&#8230; this picture is clear because we were at a dead stop in traffic. This is pretty normal. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=849" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="849" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-1211-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-1211-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Inte and Kel dropped us off at the bus station, and two hours later we were in beach zone. After a few hours of trying to find a place to stay, we found a great little hotel and dive center where we could stay, eat and dive on Mabini peninsula, in Anilao. The place is called Lead Marine, and we learned that Anilao isn&#8217;t the best place to just show up and find something. Conversely, the only places you can find online are insanely expensive so I&#8217;m glad things turned out as well as they did! Good price, good place, happily ever after. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=850" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="850" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am1.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-1211-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am1.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am1.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-1211-am1.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-1211-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=851" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="851" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-401-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-401-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-401-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-401-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-8-2014-401-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-8-2014-401-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After a sick dive! Like I said, Ed has all the good pics including underwater shots and videos. We&#8217;re a little behind transferring the photos between us&#8230;. stand by! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>Directly from the Scuba vacation in Batangas, we hopped a bus back to Manila and then all the way up to Baguio city.  A full day of travel&#8230;. over 8 hours in total. At least the VictoryLiner bus we took had a cute-as-button conductor/stewardess and free wifi.  We arrived in Baguio where the Gano family first-time meetings got going in a hurry!</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/02\/26\/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="239" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=852" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="852" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-720-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-720-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-720-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-720-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-720-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-720-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Thanks to Jane Gano for picking us up at the bus station, we got to the hotel where we met Teresa, Beth and 10-year-old Steven. Jane, Teresa, Beth and their sister Mila are the daughters of Gerry Gano, one of Ed&#8217;s half brothers. This makes them Ed&#8217;s nieces, although he&#8217;s not the oldest one in the pic! I&#8217;m going to try to keep the family straight in the blog, but please forgive me if I make a genealogical mistake! Corrections are easily made&#8230;. just shoot me a note. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=853" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="853" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-742-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-742-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-742-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-742-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-742-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-742-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Together we went to an awesome Filipino restaurant where I ate several times what stomachs are supposed to hold. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=943" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="943" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-926-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-926-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-926-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-926-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-10-2014-926-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-10-2014-926-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> While we were in Baguio, the annual Flower Festival was gearing up with a market and a botanical show. There was also a stage, which was empty at the moment except for this one little girl who was dancing like nobody was watching. There was no show, no audience (except me and a few other people), but some music was playing and she was all over it. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=855" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="855" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1206-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-1206-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1206-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1206-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1206-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-1206-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> In the Baguio market, we came across this shop with an interesting name. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=856" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="856" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1222-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-1222-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1222-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1222-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-1222-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-1222-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Turns out Sonia, the owner is a distant Gano relative and Ed had fun playing the name game and looking at the catalog of furniture and other woodworks that she and her family make to sell. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Asleep(ney) in the Jeepney. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=858" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="858" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-214-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-214-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-214-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-214-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-11-2014-214-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-11-2014-214-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Jane and Steven (her nephew, Beth&#8217;s son) at the Botanical gardens. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>Tragically, we spent only one day with the Baguio Ganos before grabbing an overnight bus (terrible, but necessary!) to Banaue.  Banaue is in the mountains east of Baguio, but is a smaller village. Banaue is the largest town in Ifugao province and when Ed&#8217;s dad lived here (1940s-50s), he built one of the first and nicest houses in the area.  This is after he built another earlier house, in the tiny area of Gohang, before the age of, oh, 30.  Another of Ed&#8217;s neices, Mila, lives in the Baguio house with her family and kindly invited us to stay with them.</p>

height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The taller part on the left is an addition, and another of Ed&#8217;s nephews, Derick, lives there with his family. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=859" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="859" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1201-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1201-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1201-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1201-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Rizjoy and Ed at the breakfast table&#8230;.. Rizjoy is 26 and a nurse, and just returned from working in Saudi Arabia. She could easily be a professional chef too. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=868" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="868" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-719-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-719-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-719-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-719-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-719-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-719-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Mila, the lady of the house! Mila is a sister of the Baguio ladies (Jane, Teresa and Beth) and lives with her husband Ron, Rizjoy and her youngest son Dirk in the house her grandpa (Ed&#8217;s dad) built. Mila is a science teacher (swoon <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span>, mother of 3, and is working on her masters every saturday. And I thought I worked hard&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=861" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="861" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-206-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-206-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-206-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-206-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-206-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-206-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Banaue is the center of the Philippine rice terrace region, and the rice cooperative is just next door to Mila&#8217;s house. Here they keep and sell tons of varieties of native rice&#8230;. this rice can only be harvested once a year (instead of 3 times, like the widely grown white rice variety in other regions), but preserving this agricultural heritage and diversity is pretty critical. Oh, and it&#8217;s prettier and way more flavorful than the normal stuff. More on rice and the terraces in the next gallery. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=865" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="865" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-241-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-241-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-241-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-241-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-241-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-241-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The high school that everyone goes to, and has gone to for decades&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=866" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="866" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-252-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-252-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-252-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-252-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-252-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-252-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Of course we visited the health center, and of course Ed was related to someone we met there. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=867" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="867" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-322-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-322-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-322-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-322-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-322-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-322-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Colorful market </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=869" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="869" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-804-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-804-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-804-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-804-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-804-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-804-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And this is Derick Gano&#8230;. Ed&#8217;s (older than him) nephew, Banaue concierge extraordinare, family genealogist, and multilingual rice terrace tour guide. Here we&#8217;re at the market picking out some food for our hike into Batad, a village built at the foot of a huge rice terrace slope and only accessible by foot (for now&#8230;.). </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>The next album is from 2 days hiking toward, on, through and out of the oldest and most spectacular feat of civil engineering and agriculture I&#8217;ve ever seen.  For the scenery haters, just give this a chance&#8230;. it&#8217;s incredible.  These terraces are estimated to have taken 2000 years to build, and are still maintained by farmers today even though they only support a fraction of the community&#8217;s rice needs. Tourism helps keep the Batad terraces maintained, but locals are worried the aging farmers won&#8217;t be able to keep it up, and the terraces will fade into disrepair like the ones right in Banaue have already done.  Glad we got to see them now&#8230;</p>
