We took a tricycle up the road to the top of a ridge, and then hiked an hour down to Batad. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=872" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="872" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1034-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1034-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1034-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1034-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1034-pm.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1034-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is how we knew we made it. :p </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=873" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="873" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1039-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1039-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1039-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1039-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1039-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1039-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Just a first glimpse&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=874" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="874" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1045-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1045-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1045-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1045-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1045-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1045-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And then you walk over the next ridge. This is the main hillside in Batad, and although its hard to see, there are 3 irrigation channels that go up and down, perpendicular to the terraces. These are the irrigation channels, and every step of the terrace gets fed by the rain and excess water flows into the channel and down to the next step. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=875" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="875" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1121-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1121-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1121-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1121-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1121-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1121-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A native Ifugao house. The houses are elevated so rats and people can&#8217;t get in as easily. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=876" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="876" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1132-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1132-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1132-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1132-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1132-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1132-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Going into the house&#8230;. under the roof, people hang skulls of the animals (or people&#8230;. they were head hunters) they killed, and the wood is carved with animals and tons of other detail. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=878" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="878" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1151-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1151-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1151-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1151-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1151-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1151-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A craftsman making a wine bottle cover out of rattan, a grass. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=877" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="877" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1133-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1133-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1133-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1133-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-12-2014-1133-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-12-2014-1133-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Laundry, Ifugao style&#8230;. the red striped cloth on the left is called a G string and is worn by the men. More on those later! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=880" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="880" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-120-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-120-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-120-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-120-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-120-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-120-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another view of Batad </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=881" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="881" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-124-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-124-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-124-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-124-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-124-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-124-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A view from the middle of the terraces&#8230;. we walked out on the steps to get there. Don&#8217;t fall in&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=882" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="882" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-125-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-125-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-125-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-125-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-125-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-125-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Hiking out and across the Batad terraces&#8230;. most of the walk was like a balance beam. Derick said, &#8220;Mud on one side, mud and pain on the other.&#8221; I tried to always focus on the side with just mud&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=883" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="883" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-127-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-127-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-127-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-127-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-127-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-127-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A farmer covering newly planted seedlings. The Batad terraces are interesting because all the rice isn&#8217;t planted all at one time. So, you can see the plants at various stages of development. Makes the terraces look like a funny green patchwork. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=884" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="884" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-135-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-135-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-135-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-135-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-135-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-135-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We made it to the center! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=885" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="885" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-143-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-143-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-143-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-143-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-143-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-143-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Derick, on the edge of a terrace with a rice crop that&#8217;s already come up. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=886" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="886" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-153-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-153-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-153-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-153-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-153-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-153-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The little pink blobs are snail egg masses&#8230;. the snails eat the rice (bad) but people and fish eat the snails (good). Rats are another problem, since they also eat the seedlings. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=887" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="887" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-203-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-203-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-203-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-203-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-203-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-203-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This pretty decoration means &#8220;this is my rice terrace, stay off.&#8221; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=888" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="888" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-224-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-224-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-224-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-224-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-224-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-224-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A close up of a few native houses in Batad and some of the bigger terraces. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=889" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="889" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-250-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-250-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-250-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-250-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-250-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-250-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We walked across the whole hillside and down to this waterfall&#8230;. good day of carefully hiking (no one fell in the water!!) and walking up stairs. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=890" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="890" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-327-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-327-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-327-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-327-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-327-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-327-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another method of irrigation and transferring water among the terraces&#8230;.. the little hollowed out branch on the right is letting water from the higher one flow into the lower one. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=892" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="892" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1053-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1053-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1053-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1053-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1053-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1053-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The red plant helps to ward off evil spirits, while the white flags wave around and act as scarecrows for rice-eating rats. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=893" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="893" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1117-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1117-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1117-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1117-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1117-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1117-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ed was all about the tricycles&#8230;. whereas I took the opportunity to remind myself of that one quote that goes &#8220;Do something every day that scares you.&#8221; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=894" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="894" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1130-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1130-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1130-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1130-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-13-2014-1130-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-13-2014-1130-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After hiking out of Batad, we passed by another small terrace village of Bangaan, where the government bought brown paint so everyone could paint their roofs the same color, for the benefit of pretty photos like this one. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>Back in Banaue, meeting more family, watching an Ifugao dance and cultural show, shopping for g-strings, and stealing wooden bikes from children.</p>

height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back in Banaue with the tricycle&#8230;. a look down the Main Street. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=895" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="895" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-757-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-757-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-757-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-757-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-757-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-757-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One evening we went to an Ifugao dance and culture show, where we watched traditional dances and reenactments ceremonies, and learned about the traditional clothing. The wrap the guy is wearing is the g-string. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> Ed met a few relatives who were performing, and we got all decked out after the show. Nice spear. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=951" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="951" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-753-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-753-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-753-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-753-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-753-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-753-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I got roped in too&#8230;. the dead bird head dress I&#8217;m wearing is actually for the guys&#8230;. but it was so cool! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=946" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="946" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-302-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-302-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-302-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-302-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-302-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-302-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More dress-up&#8230;. this time at viewpoint overlooking the &#8220;pyramid&#8221; rice terrace outside of Banaue. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=956" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="956" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-252-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-252-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-252-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-252-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-252-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-252-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> At the viewpoint, the elders of the Ifugao tribe that Ed&#8217;s family is from get dressed up and take donations for photos. These guys are all around 95, and the blind man remembered Ed&#8217;s dad from when he lived there. It was super cool to hear them tell us about him. The women have bright red lips from chewing beetlenut&#8230;. a mixture of tobacco, calcium carbonate powder, a local leaf and a nut called beetlenut. Together these things turn bright red and the old folks chew it like candy. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=953" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="953" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-849-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-849-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-849-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-849-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-849-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-849-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Which of these g-strings is gonna make my ass look the best?? &#8230;Shopping for the traditional fabrics and blankets at the Banaue market. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=896" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="896" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-904-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-904-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-904-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-904-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-904-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-904-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Derick making an(other) exciting family introduction. Ed is related to this guy we saw at the market, but I can&#8217;t remember how. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=897" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="897" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-948-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-948-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-948-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-948-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-948-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-948-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> So many varieties of rice </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=947" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="947" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-313-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-313-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-313-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-313-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-313-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-313-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another introduction&#8230;. this one made me cry. The woman on the right got so excited and her face just lit up when Derick explained (in the Ifugao language) who Ed was. She kept touching Ed&#8217;s face, and couldn&#8217;t get over how much he looked like his half brothers. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=950" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="950" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-330-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-330-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-330-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-330-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-330-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-330-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> More family&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=955" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="955" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-139-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-139-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-139-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-139-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-139-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-139-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And another introduction&#8230;. these were not pre-arranged, we were visiting different places with Derick and he would make the introduction when we came across someone in the family. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=899" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="899" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-135-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-135-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-135-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-135-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-135-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-135-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We took a tricycle a short way up the mountain out of Banaue, to the village where Ed&#8217;s dad grew up, called Gohang. Beth (in yellow) who lives in Baguio came to meet us to say goodbye, since this was our last day in the mountains. So nice, especially since Banaue and Baguio are 6 hours apart by car. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=900" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="900" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-156-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-156-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-156-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-156-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-156-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-156-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Looking out on Mount Gano&#8230;. no really, that slope on the right side is land that belongs to the family. Derick currently oversees it and makes sure people don&#8217;t illegally harvest the trees. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=902" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="902" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-232-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-232-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-232-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-232-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-232-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-232-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> In Gohang, Ed&#8217;s dad built a small house before moving to &#8220;the big city&#8221; of Banaue back in the 30s or 40s. The woman who lives there now told us about it, and showed us around. The original house is actually just the top story&#8230;. it was lifted, and a newer addition was added below. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=904" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="904" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-256-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-256-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-256-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-256-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-256-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-256-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The house Ed&#8217;s dad built, from the other side&#8230;. just the part sitting on top of the roof is original. The window on the far right used to be the front door. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=903" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="903" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-245-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-245-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-245-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-245-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-245-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-245-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We were able to go inside and upstairs to see the inside of the house&#8230;. Ed testing out a tiny bed in one of the tiny rooms. In the last 20 years, this house has been a place where peace corps volunteers in Ifugao stay for their 2-year assignments. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=948" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="948" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-320-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-320-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-320-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-320-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-320-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-320-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Along the way, I saw this kid on bike. Not just any bike&#8230;. this is an Ifugao wooden bike, and I wrote about these things in my Bonderman application essay. We pulled over in the tricycle so I could take a picture&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=958" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="958" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-321-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-321-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-321-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-321-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-321-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-321-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> &#8230;.. and then steal the bike from the poor kid for a few minutes. There&#8217;s a little foot brake in front, and the bike is carved with animals on the steer tube. There&#8217;s a festival every 3 years in april where they race these bikes&#8230;. we&#8217;re definitely coming back!! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=949" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="949" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-322-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-322-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-322-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-322-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-322-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-322-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> weeeeeee!!!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=952" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="952" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-814-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-814-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-814-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-814-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-14-2014-814-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-14-2014-814-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Money shot&#8230;. there are even rice terraces on the paper bills! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=905" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="905" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-333-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-333-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-333-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-333-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-15-2014-333-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-15-2014-333-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ed found his people&#8230;.. the Ifugao 2nd district civil engineering office. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>Back in Manila, Ed had just a couple days before his flight. We hung out with the Manila family, and they kindly set me up with a whole condo unit to call home base for my last 2 weeks in the Philippines. The day after Ed went back to Seattle, I headed south to the island of Mindoro for more diving off Sabang beach in Puerto Galera.</p>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/02\/26\/the-philippines-3-weeks-of-family-fish-and-fear-of-death-by-jeep\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="239" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=906" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="906" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-150-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-16-2014-150-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-150-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-150-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-150-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-16-2014-150-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ed and cousin Evelyn at her house&#8230;. Evelyn&#8217;s mom is Ed&#8217;s aunt, on his mom&#8217;s side. She made a delicious peanut-based Kare-Kare soup for us&#8230;. no surprise it was amazing, she works as a chef and catering director at Hotel Sofitel Manila!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=907" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="907" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-153-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-16-2014-153-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-153-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-153-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-16-2014-153-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-16-2014-153-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The games kids play&#8230;.. this is a spide fight. If you look, there are 2 small spiders on this stick, and when they meet each other, they fight. If your spider kills and eats the other kid&#8217;s spider. you win. Also, props to the kid w/ the biohazard shirt. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px;
