height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The condo I&#8217;m staying in is on the 27th floor, and I get a nice territorial view including the lovely Manila smog layer. #densestcityintheworld </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=909" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="909" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-151-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-151-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-151-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-151-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-151-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-151-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The Philippines takes street food to a whole new level&#8230;. you can get a serving of one of these delicious one-pot wonders for less than 50 cents. It&#8217;s not always hot, but sometimes you put your tastebuds in front of GI hell risk factors. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=912" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="912" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-409-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-409-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-409-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-409-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-409-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-409-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I spent an afternoon walking around the campus of U of the Philippines&#8230;. nice to be among students again for awhile. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=913" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="913" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-615-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-615-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Lucky for me, Laura Newman introduced me to her friend and former roommate, Lourdes&#8230;. we met for dinner and were instant friends. Lourdes took me to a nice Filipino restaurant and afterward we swam laps in the pool at her condo. The nights are perfect for swimming here! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=914" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="914" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am1.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-615-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am1.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am1.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-18-2014-615-am1.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-18-2014-615-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Filipino dishes&#8230;. coconut Laing, green papaya salad, fried catfish&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=915" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="915" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-19-2014-851-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-19-2014-851-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-19-2014-851-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-19-2014-851-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-19-2014-851-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-19-2014-851-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I decided to head back south, to a different beach and island (just 3 hrs away) to do some more scuba diving. This is Sabang beach, in Puerto Galera. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=916" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="916" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-20-2014-747-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-20-2014-747-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-20-2014-747-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-20-2014-747-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-20-2014-747-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-20-2014-747-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I found a small beachfront hotel/restaurant for a good deal, although this isthe first time in my trip I wish I&#8217;d made advance reservations. I had to move between two different hotels because rooms weren&#8217;t available, and I had to pay a little more than I wanted to/could have had I planned a little sooner. But, all was well and the diving was great. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=917" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="917" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1112-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1112-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1112-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1112-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1112-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1112-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ninja camo wetsuit!!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=918" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="918" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-225-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-225-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-225-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-225-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-225-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-225-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Jay, the divemaster&#8230;. there are lots of dive shops around, but there was no one else at the one run by my hotel. So I got a private dive guide, and got to pick where we went! I dove with two different shops on this trip, but only have pics of this one&#8230;. the other was good too, happy to talk more about options if youre thinking of diving in the PIs. Including all gear and air, I paid less than $30 per dive. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Moray eel&#8230;. there were tons of these! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=920" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="920" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1128-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1128-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1128-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1128-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1128-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1128-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> There is nothing attractive about a regulator in your mouth. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=921" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="921" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1142-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1142-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1142-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1142-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1142-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1142-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Emperor angelfish </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=922" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="922" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1156-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1156-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1156-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1156-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-1156-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-1156-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Hawksbill turtle&#8230;. pretty sure I saw this one in Galapagos <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=923" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="923" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-249-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-249-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-249-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-249-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-249-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-249-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Oh the lionfish&#8230;. they&#8217;re super invasive in North America, but people aren&#8217;t as anxious to kill them off here since this is closer to their native habitat. I&#8217;m not sure how populations here have or haven&#8217;t changed. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=924" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="924" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-254-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-254-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-254-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-254-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-254-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-254-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stonefish!! Glad I found this guy with my eyes, and not my hand&#8230;. they&#8217;ll kill ya </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=925" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="925" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-309-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-309-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-309-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-309-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-309-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-309-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A ribbon eel&#8230;. it&#8217;s actually a moray&#8230;. it has its mouth open, and has funny yellow things coming off the top of its head. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=926" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="926" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-333-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-333-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-333-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-333-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-333-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-333-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Exploring the village of Sabang, beyond the beach&#8230;. mmm grilled street chicken&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=928" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="928" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-437-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-437-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-437-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-437-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-437-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-437-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Took a walk out into the neighborhoods and up to a lighthouse&#8230;. some houses I saw along the way. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=929" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="929" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-354-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-354-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-354-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-354-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-354-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-354-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> One solution to the water problem (i.e. no fresh running water)&#8230;. These barrels are filled with water, from the rain, or maybe a truck? There are pumps propped on the top, and each house has a hose connected to one of the drums, and water is pumped in. Along the side of the road are tons of black hoses&#8230;. looks like a big mess of spaghetti but each hose brings water to a house. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=931" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="931" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-427-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-427-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-427-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-427-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-427-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-427-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The requisite &#8220;these kids want to see a digital pic of themselves&#8221; shot. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=932" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="932" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-504-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-504-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-504-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-504-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-21-2014-504-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-21-2014-504-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Bubble tea!!! This canadian expat, Ken, started this bubble tea shop and we ended up chatting for a couple of hours. I learned that the major industry in Sabang isn&#8217;t actually diving, it&#8217;s prostitution. I suspect there is some overlap between the two, since I saw a lot of old white men with cute Filipinas walking along the beach to thevarious dive resorts. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=936" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="936" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-917-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-917-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-917-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-917-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-917-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-917-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On my way back to Manila, I stopped in a town called Tagaytay, where another family member has a vacation house. Tagaytay is also famous for the Taal volcano, the tiniest volcano in the PIs, out in the middle of a lake. Brian, in the picture, takes care of the guest house and we hung out and cooked together in the evenings. He makes one hell of a chicken adobo&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=933" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="933" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1251-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-1251-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1251-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1251-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1251-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-1251-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Taal volcano, taken from a lookout point where I took a walk. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=934" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="934" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1238-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-1238-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1238-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1238-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-23-2014-1238-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-23-2014-1238-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Dog in a tube!!! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=937" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="937" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-755-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-24-2014-755-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-755-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-755-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-755-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-24-2014-755-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back in Manila, Ed&#8217;s cousin Ghia and I went to the original Magnolia store&#8230;. it&#8217;s a famous brand of Filipino ice cream. Ghia is a public health dentist so we had tons to talk about, in addition to our sweet teeth&#8230;. shhh don&#8217;t tell the dental patients. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=938" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="938" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-818-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-24-2014-818-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-818-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-818-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-24-2014-818-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-24-2014-818-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Oh yes, we did. And it was amazing!!! Good thing I&#8217;m getting back on the bike next week&#8230;. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=969" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="969" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1104-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-1104-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1104-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1104-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1104-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-1104-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I got to visit Hotel Sofitel where Ate Evelyin works&#8230;. she took me to the breakfast buffet&#8230;. oh god, it was heavenly. They had a country specific breakfast bar from China, Japan, PIs, Korea, France, in additiona to all the traditional breakfast food&#8230;. wowww. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=967" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="967" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-105-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-105-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-105-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-105-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-105-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-105-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Kel and Inte&#8230;. Kel did the sick paintjob on his scooter himself. Kel is Evelyn&#8217;s son, and Ghia&#8217;s cousin. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=968" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="968" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1137-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,764" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-1137-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1137-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1137-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-27-2014-1137-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-27-2014-1137-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The Barangay-mobile! &#8220;Barangay&#8221; means &#8220;barrio&#8221; or neighborhood, and Ghia&#8217;s mom is the Barangay captain where they live in Manila. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=971" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="971" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-26-2014-402-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Feb-26-2014-402-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-26-2014-402-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-26-2014-402-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/wpid-photo-feb-26-2014-402-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Feb-26-2014-402-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And while I&#8217;ve been halfway around the world hardly working, UW decided to make things official. Thanks to Ed for sending the evidence&#8230;. the &#8220;D&#8221; is for Done!! </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<p>And now we&#8217;re up to date&#8230;. I just finished patching the holes in my cardboard bike box for the flight from here to Ho Chi Minh City tomorrow. The flight is 2 hours, and cost $95&#8230; awesome!  When I get to HCM, our friend Phu&#8217;s aunt Hanh has graciously offered to pick me up and let me stay with her for a few days while I set up the bike and get my bearings.  The next phase will be a solid cycling trip&#8230;. I have until the first week in April to make it through south Vietnam, Cambodia and Thailand and fly to Bangalore. There is a hilarious website called mrpumpy.net that I&#8217;m using for route inspiration&#8230;. other ideas/advice/experience is always welcome!  I have about 5 weeks and I think I can do it&#8230;. I hear the Mekong delta is pretty flat!!?  Stay tuned&#8230;.</p>
					</div><!-- .entry -->
					</div><!-- /.middle -->
	<div class="fix"></div>
</div><!-- /.post -->
			
				<div id="post-839" class="post-839 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized tag-ecuador">

	<div class="post-meta col-left">
			<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/01/30/to-the-jungle-and-back/" title="Permalink to To the jungle and&nbsp;back" rel="bookmark" class="date-link">
		<span class="post-date">
			January 30, 2014			<span class="bg">&nbsp;</span>
		</span>
	</a>
	<ul>
		
		
					<li class="comments"><a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/01/30/to-the-jungle-and-back/#respond">Leave a comment</a></li>
		
			</ul>
	</div><!-- /.meta -->

	<div class="middle col-left clearfix">
		<h1 class="title">
					<a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/2014/01/30/to-the-jungle-and-back/" rel="bookmark">To the jungle and&nbsp;back</a>
				</h1>

		
		<div class="entry clearfix">
			<div>I made it into the rainforest, and back to tell about it!</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>Since New Year&#8217;s, I&#8217;ve been moving by bike (and a little bus, a little canoe&#8230;.), slowly northeastward with the goal of visiting Parque Yasuni, the largest area of protected, primary rainforest in Ecuador (1.3 million hectares), with the highest recorded biodiversity in the world I&#8217;ve heard. I wanted to go far into the rainforest, preferrably with someone who knows it like their backyard, and see all I could in the span of a few days.  We all grow up with &#8220;The Amazon&#8221; in movies, books, Discovery Channel, and Tucans on cereal boxes, but I wanted the Full Monty.  All the amazing biology I&#8217;ve learned via professors, colleagues and powerpoint&#8230;. what does that look, sound and feel like? Did they actually do a good job making all those rainforest exhibits at all the natural history museums? Monkeys! Piranhas! A million kinds of ants!!!</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>So there was the goal&#8230;. the punchline is I camped in Yasuni, near the Peruvian border, for 4 days, with two of the lovliest and most knowledgeable local naturalists I could ever have asked for. And it was absolutely spectacular. Much more on that later, with pics of course&#8230;. you can see exactly where I was <a href="https://share.delorme.com/beeronabike">here</a>, look for the eastern-most points, near the Peruvian border. The &#8220;how&#8221; of getting there was interesting in itself though too&#8230;. I did an experiment of sorts, and I&#8217;ll share some insights and tips that might be useful for anyone thinking of coming out to the Amazon with a little less time and flexibility than I&#8217;ve had. I&#8217;ve also had a lot of time to reflect and ask questions about the big petroleum industry presence I&#8217;ve seen along the way to Yasuni. More on that too.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>The experiment was to see whether I could get to the rainforest as I wanted to, without making a reservation through an agency far in advance. I&#8217;m a really good planner and I could&#8217;ve had some kind of reservation in the bag over a month ago in Quito, where there are lots of agency offices, and you can sign up far in advance because &#8220;Groups are filling up! You can&#8217;t just show up and find someone!&#8221;  Not following this advice is counter to a number of my core personality traits, so that&#8217;s why this was experimental. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> But Ideally, I wanted to meet the person/guide I would go with, and I didn&#8217;t want to go with someone who spent a lot of time in Quito and not the jungle. I also wanted to avoid staying at one of the many lodges available, just because they tend to be expensive. Many are run by indigenous communities and provide income from ecotourism, so I&#8217;m all about the lodges if that had been of interest and in my price range.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>As of New Year&#8217;s my plan was to bike east to the town of Puyo, on the western side of El Oriente, the Amazon region of Ecuador. From Puyo, I thought, I&#8217;ll find some information or a guide, and make some kind of plan. From Puyo, I would be less than a day by bus away from the major river ports where you can take canoes into Yasuni, so I would be mobile and could act on any new information.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>Pics from the road to Puyo, some cool things I saw there,  and all the rain&#8230;. I learned it&#8217;s not called a RAINforest for nothing. After coming down to Puyo from Banos, you are officially in &#8220;El Oriente&#8221;, or the jungle.</div>
<div>
<div class="tiled-gallery type-square tiled-gallery-unresized" data-original-width="479" data-carousel-extra='{&quot;blog_id&quot;:58678775,&quot;permalink&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/karlynsandiego.wordpress.com\/2014\/01\/30\/to-the-jungle-and-back\/&quot;,&quot;likes_blog_id&quot;:58678775}' > <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="239" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=720" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="720" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-928-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-928-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-928-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-928-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-928-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-928-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Leaving Banos on a fantastic road through the mountains and down to El Oriente, or the rainforest. Always a good sign when you see these on the road&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 239px; height: 239px;" data-original-width="239" data-original-height="239" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=721" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="721" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-947-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-947-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-947-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-947-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-947-am.jpg?w=235&#038;h=235&#038;crop=1" width="235" height="235" data-original-width="235" data-original-height="235" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-947-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 235px; height: 235px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Parts of the Banos-Puyo road went through dark tunnels, which isn&#8217;t super safe for bikes plus cars. But, they had made these &#8220;ciclovias&#8221; just for bikes, that skirt around the tunnels and had great views. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=714" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="714" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-1102-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-1102-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-1102-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-1102-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-1102-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-1102-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Passing through a pueblo on the way to Puyo, met this guy who was working on lunch for the restaurant. We talked about visiting the Amazon, and about chocolate&#8230;. at this point, it started to rain, and I think I didn&#8217;t dry off for the next 5 days. I learned &#8220;Puyo&#8221; means cloudy in Kichwa. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=716" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="716" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-138-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-138-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-138-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-138-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-138-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-138-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Arrived in Puyo&#8230; best street lamps ever!!! I found a nice but cheap hotel, and tried to figure out what to do next, in order to visit Yasuni. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=718" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="718" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-424-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-424-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-424-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-424-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-424-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-424-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Took a walk around the town, and on a trail along the river. I found the Omaere Ethnobotanical Center, and walked in for a tour. The center is run by a Shuar traditional healer and her American husband Chris. (The Shuar are one group of indigenous people in the ecuadorian amazon). This is a traditional Shuar house, made from a type of palm wood and fronds. I learned tons about their culture, and went on a walk through their 300 hectares of space, planted with traditional medicinal plants. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=715" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="715" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-137-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-137-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-137-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-137-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-3-2014-137-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-3-2014-137-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is cinnamon, or Canela, in Spanish! The bark is used for cinnamon powder, but you can chew the leaves and they taste like sweet cinnamon candy. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=717" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="717" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-343-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-343-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-343-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-343-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-343-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-343-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Cool stick bug at Omaere ethnobotanical center. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=719" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="719" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-429-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-429-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-429-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-429-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-4-2014-429-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-4-2014-429-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Chris demonstrating the use of this fruit for traditional body paint. You have heard of it before&#8230; it&#8217;s also called Annatto. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=722" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="722" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-155-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-155-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-155-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-155-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-155-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-155-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another day in Puyo, I went out for a bikeride (in the rain, of course), and found a sign for this indigenous kichwa community where you can visit to learn more about Kichwa culture. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=723" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="723" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1200-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1200-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1200-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1200-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1200-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1200-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Following the sign into the community, across a bridge&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=724" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="724" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1208-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1208-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1208-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1208-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1208-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1208-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> I met a baby spider monkey! Sorry it&#8217;s not available for adoption, already gave it to my sis for her birthday. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=725" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="725" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1223-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1223-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1223-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1223-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1223-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1223-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Also met this Macaw&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=726" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="726" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1254-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1254-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1254-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1254-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-1254-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-1254-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And some Argentinean students who were staying here a few days as part of an extended tour. I asked if I could join them for lunch, and Maria (a grandmother, who was doing the cooking) made me a plate too. Trout, Yucca, rice, tomatoes. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=727" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="727" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-148-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-148-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-148-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-148-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-6-2014-148-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-6-2014-148-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Maria and her granddaughter, in front of the board where each family in the community displays and sells their handcrafts. The jewelery is made from seeds and parts of rainforest plants, and the pottery from the red clay dirt that&#8217;s characteristic of this area. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
</div>
<div>At this point, I&#8217;m in Puyo, and all the planning I had done for the Amazon trip was that I had the phone number of a guide that I got from someone I met in an agency in Quito.  I had messaged him a few times, but communication was sparse&#8230; I was hoping to find another option.  And other options showed up, just from wandering around the town a few days.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>For example, Chris from the Omaere center had built some urine-diverting dry toilets there, as a way to show that you can deal with human waste in a stink-free manner without dumping it directly into the river (Amazon tributary).  Sadly, this is what currently happens&#8230; human waste goes right in the river, toilet paper is kept separate and thrown in the trash. Chris had worked with a few communities out in Yasuni previously, and had built a few of these new toilets in hopes that they would catch on, at least with the ecotourists. We ended up talking for several hours, and founds lots of scientific interests in common, and I went back to learn more about how the dry toilets worked. Turns out Chris had been looking for a volunteer to follow up on the toilets out near Yasuni, and I said I&#8217;d be happy to do the poo recon if there was a place for me to stay and eat while I was there.  Also at Omaere, I met Taruka (also goes by <a href="https://www.facebook.com/luis.dagua.5">Luis</a>), who gives tours of the medicinal plants on site, but is also a guide in Yasuni and takes people out to visit the rainforest.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>Huzzah! Two fantastic people, and two different opportunities to visit Yasuni!  All I had to do was&#8230; wait.  Chris needed to contact the communities to ask if they would be open to a volunteer visit, and Taruka needed to wait for a 3 more people to be interested in a visit to Yasuni, to bring the price down.  I had decided early on after doing some research and looking at a Rough Guide that I was ok paying $75/day or less for a trip.  This has to cover food, lodging, park fees and gas for the motor canoe for both me and the guide, and anyone else who goes along, in addition to the part that goes to the families to support further ecotourism activities.  In the meantime, the other guide (Jhon) who I had messaged earlier with mixed luck started writing, saying he could also take me out to Yasuni. Another thing I learned is that everyone and their uncle is a &#8220;guide&#8221;&#8230; anyone will take you out to the jungle, and it was easier than I thought to find people who would do it. It&#8217;s not so easy to decide who to go with, or why you would choose one person over another!</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>The point of all this text is to give you an idea of what happens when you don&#8217;t just reserve something in an office in Quito.  I decided I would wait another 4-5 days, and if the options with Chris and Taruka didn&#8217;t work out, I would meet Jhon and go to Yasuni with him.  I was going to just wait in Puyo, but there was too dang much rain so I got on my bike (in the rain) and left, heading north and east toward the port towns of Misahualli and Coca where I would need to take a motor canoe to Yasuni anyway.  I was in contact with everyone by email and phone, and the rain let up after I left.</div>
<div></div>
<div>
