height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=731" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="731" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-955-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-955-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-955-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-955-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-955-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-955-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Thankfully, these little shelters popped up every so often so I could dry off and rest a bit. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=729" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="729" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-1252-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-8-2014-1252-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-1252-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-1252-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-1252-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-8-2014-1252-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These were interesting&#8230; the provincial government built these nice vendor stalls with grills and shelters, presumably for people to have a space to sell food and other things along the roadside. Economic develompent in action, I thought. I was confused tho because it was a weekday and every single one was empty&#8230; there were many along the road. Good idea, bad execution maybe? These weren&#8217;t in dense pueblos, but rather in open areas with not much else&#8230; I&#8217;d guess they just wouldn&#8217;t get enough business with the amount of traffic. Note this was a weekday afternoon too. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=730" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="730" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-150-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-8-2014-150-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-150-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-150-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-8-2014-150-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-8-2014-150-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> My first flat tire!!!! Front tire went PSSSSS really loud as I was going downhill&#8230; bike wobbled a lot, I thought I would crash. I was able to stop without falling though, and miraculously the rain stopped as I started to change the flat. Note to others&#8230; I was using a super thick thorn-resistant tube, but the flat was caused by the valve stem ripping away from the rubber, no thorn involved. The defect was serious enough for me that I replaced the bulky tube with a regular old tube and it&#8217;s been fine so far. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=732" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="732" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1032-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1032-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1032-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1032-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1032-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1032-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Stopping at Shangri-La for a snack&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=733" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="733" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1039-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1039-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1039-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1039-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1039-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1039-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These trees are all over the Oriente&#8230; I liked how they were all curvy and spindly. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=734" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="734" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1212-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1212-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1212-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1212-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-1212-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-1212-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Since I was still killing time waiting to decide which way I would get to Yasuni, I took a detour and rode to Misahualli for 2 days. This is the western-most port on the Rio Napo, which goes into Yasuni, and all the way to Iquitos, Peru if you want to go that far. The road I took to Misahualli was very nicely paved&#8230; cutting through the rainforest that needed &#8220;saving&#8221; 10 years ago. Now there are cows grazing, and you can buy property along the road with electricy and light! There are signs along the road that remind you how much the petroleum industry has helped this area to grow. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=735" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="735" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-333-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-333-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-333-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-333-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-333-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-333-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> First thing I did in Misahualli was grab a motor canoe to visit a place where cacao trees grow and you can see the first parts of the chocolate-making process. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=736" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="736" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-407-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-407-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-407-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-407-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-407-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-407-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> No one was at the cacao farm, so I visited a kichwa community instead, and held their boa constrictor in honor of Skeletor. May he rest in peace! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=737" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="737" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-417-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-417-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-417-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-417-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-417-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-417-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Redfoot tortoise </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=738" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="738" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-420-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-420-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-420-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-420-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-9-2014-420-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-9-2014-420-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Kids playing volleyball </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=739" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="739" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-832-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-832-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-832-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-832-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-832-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-832-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> School group going to catch a canoe in Misahualli </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
</div>
<div></div>
<div>I spent some time in Misahualli, still waiting to hear back from either Chris or Taruka about the visit to Yasuni, either to check on the dry toilets or visit communities living in Yasuni. The coolest thing I did in Misahualli was to visit a small forest reserve where you can learn about cacao trees and roast your own beans.  It ended up being an awesome walk through the jungle with a local guy named Claudio, who took me out all by myself on a curated jungle tour.  And the chocolate was delicious. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span></div>
<div></div>
<div>

				Arriving by canoe for the chocolate tour
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon portrait'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=741'><img width="113" height="150" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-903-am.jpg?w=113&#038;h=150" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Local guide Claudio, lives in a Kichwa community just up the river." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-741" data-attachment-id="741" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-903-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-903-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-903-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-903-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-741'>
				Local guide Claudio, lives in a Kichwa community just up the river. 
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon portrait'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=742'><img width="113" height="150" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-924-am.jpg?w=113&#038;h=150" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="The big brown lumps on the trees are termite houses... made from excreted digested wood. Claudio told me that Kichwas use these termite houses as mosquito repellent... they are brittle and you can rub the pulverized termite excrement on your skin." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-742" data-attachment-id="742" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-924-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-924-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-924-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-924-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-742'>
				The big brown lumps on the trees are termite houses&#8230; made from excreted digested wood. Claudio told me that Kichwas use these termite houses as mosquito repellent&#8230; they are brittle and you can rub the pulverized termite excrement on your skin.
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" /><dl class='gallery-item'>

			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=748'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="This tree is called a Matapalo, and it&#039;s essentially a parasite... it started as a vine, enveloping another tree and now it&#039;s huge and has these awesome giant roots.  In the center of themess is another tree that was taken over." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-748" data-attachment-id="748" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1030-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1030-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-748'>
				This tree is called a Matapalo, and it&#8217;s essentially a parasite&#8230; it started as a vine, enveloping another tree and now it&#8217;s huge and has these awesome giant roots.  In the center of themess is another tree that was taken over.
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" /><dl class='gallery-item'>

				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=751'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1147-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="A cacao pod!  I learned there are afew types of cacao tree, and the red and yellow varieties are used for their beans for making chocolate. This is a pod from a yellow  cacao tree." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-751" data-attachment-id="751" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1147-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1147-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1147-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1147-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>

				A cacao pod!  I learned there are afew types of cacao tree, and the red and yellow varieties are used for their beans for making chocolate. This is a pod from a yellow  cacao tree. 
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" /><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=752'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1149-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Inside the pod, are the beans, covered in a white fruity pulp. That stuff was really sweet and delicious... I had no idea. Maybe I learned that on the Theo tour in Seattle, but forgot." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-752" data-attachment-id="752" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1149-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1149-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1149-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1149-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-752'>
				Inside the pod, are the beans, covered in a white fruity pulp. That stuff was really sweet and delicious&#8230; I had no idea. Maybe I learned that on the Theo tour in Seattle, but forgot. 
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=753'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1152-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="When you really make cacao, you have to remove the white pulp, allow the beans to ferment 3 days and then dry off.  Since I didn&#039;t have that time, Claudio had some already fermented and dried beans, sorta like a cooking show." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-753" data-attachment-id="753" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1152-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1152-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1152-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1152-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-753'>
				When you really make cacao, you have to remove the white pulp, allow the beans to ferment 3 days and then dry off.  Since I didn&#8217;t have that time, Claudio had some already fermented and dried beans, sorta like a cooking show. 
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon portrait'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=754'><img width="113" height="150" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1153-am.jpg?w=113&#038;h=150" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Roasting the dried beans over a fire" aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-754" data-attachment-id="754" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1153-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1153-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1153-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1153-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-754'>
				Roasting the dried beans over a fire
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" /><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=755'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1157-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="You stir them constantly, till they start to crackle like popcorn. Note I&#039;m still eating the sweet cacao pulp... :)" aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-755" data-attachment-id="755" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1157-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1157-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1157-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1157-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-755'>
				You stir them constantly, till they start to crackle like popcorn. Note I&#8217;m still eating the sweet cacao pulp&#8230; <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span>
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=756'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1204-pm.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Roasted beans, after about 15 min." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-756" data-attachment-id="756" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1204-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1204-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1204-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1204-pm.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-756'>
				Roasted beans, after about 15 min. 
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>

				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=759'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1210-pm.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Then, you grind the beans in a mill, and that&#039;s your cacao powder." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-759" data-attachment-id="759" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1210-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1210-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1210-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1210-pm.jpg?w=479" /></a>

				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-759'>
				Then, you grind the beans in a mill, and that&#8217;s your cacao powder. 
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=760'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1217-pm.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Best hot chocolate ever... mix the ground beans with milk and some sugar and you&#039;re done." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-760" data-attachment-id="760" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1217-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-1217-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1217-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-1217-pm.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-760'>
				Best hot chocolate ever&#8230; mix the ground beans with milk and some sugar and you&#8217;re done.  
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" /><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=761'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-532-pm.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-532-PM.jpg" data-attachment-id="761" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-532-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-532-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-532-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-532-pm.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=763'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-11-2014-1058-am.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="More fermenting cacao beans on the side of the road... these are light colored, probably were just put out that day. Note the sign for the lot available in the background... you could move to the jungle and make c acao too!!" aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-763" data-attachment-id="763" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-11-2014-1058-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-11-2014-1058-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-11-2014-1058-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-11-2014-1058-am.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-763'>
				More fermenting cacao beans on the side of the road&#8230; these are light colored, probably were just put out that day. Note the sign for the lot available in the background&#8230; you could move to the jungle and make c acao too!!
				</dd></dl><dl class='gallery-item'>
			<dt class='gallery-icon landscape'>
				<a href='https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=762'><img width="150" height="113" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=150&#038;h=113" class="attachment-thumbnail" alt="Biking across the bridge in Misahualli... getting ready to head farther north to Tena." aria-describedby="gallery-839-27-762" data-attachment-id="762" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-553-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-10-2014-553-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-10-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=479" /></a>
			</dt>
				<dd class='wp-caption-text gallery-caption' id='gallery-839-27-762'>
				Biking across the bridge in Misahualli&#8230; getting ready to head farther north to Tena. 
				</dd></dl><br style="clear: both" />
		</div>

</div>
<div></div>
<div>After Misahualli, I biked further north to Tena, another small town where you can grab tours to the jungle and find guides to take your rafting and whitewater Kayaking. I didn&#8217;t realize this, but this part of Ecuador has apparently the best whitewater kayaking in all of South America.  I spent a few days in Tena at a hostel with a kitchen so I could cook myself some vegetables&#8230; miss those things!! Still having fun, killing time waiting to figure out the Yasuni trip. In Tena, I biked out to some caves, and went on another bikeride with a Belgian woman I met at the hostel. Took lots of pics of what I call the &#8220;Petro-burbs.&#8221;</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>The oil-Amazon situation is a complicated one, and I&#8217;ve made an effort to talk with as many people as I can about what&#8217;s happening and how they feel about it. Essentially, petroleum companies bring money, schools, medical care and infrastructure to the Amazon and the indigenous communities who live there.  The communities in turn must choose&#8230; to accept these new resources and permit oil extraction and river pollution, or to refuse (which is often difficult politically).  By accepting all the help, the community can grow, people can live longer, and in time the need for resources to support this larger population will probably outweigh what the rainforest can provide. Things will not look the same here in 10, 20 or 50 years, but this sounds like the story of all humanity, right?</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>I talked to one indigenous man who said &#8220;hell yes, bring in the petrol!&#8221; Correa, the president of Ecuador, actually has helped to bring it much more money from Petroleum&#8230; only 5% of the value of the oil used to come back to Ecuador, and now it&#8217;s 50%. So, much more money than before is coming into the country in exchange for disrupting the most biodiverse primary ecosystems on earth. This sounds like fantastic, long overdue progress to me, but seems to miss the bigger picture.  Paraphrasing the guy further&#8230; Look what petrol has done for us&#8230; ecotourism and conservation can&#8217;t even touch that kind of influence. We live here, it&#8217;s our decision, you tourists and conservationists should stay out. What happens to the jungle and our culture is our business.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>While this guy had a loud voice and a lot to say to me (kind of an aggressive rant, actually), others I spoke with had a more nuanced perspective. They seemed more  concerned about the loss of a culture that depends on the intact rainforest, and acknowledged the role of the rainforest for the rest of the earth, and not just the people who live there.  As a wealthy tourist myself, I can&#8217;t begin to understand what it must be like to suddenly have access to the modern, expensive, petrol-provided goods and services that you see others around you and in the media enjoying. I can&#8217;t imagine having to decide to deny my community the resources that could really improve their health and education, in order to refuse oil company influence.  I also can&#8217;t and won&#8217;t shake my ingrained systems-level, big picture mindset that sacrificing Yasuni for a finite amount of oil is short sighted and a bad decision. There have been a number of proposed solutions, including a less invasive way of extracting oil (I don&#8217;t know much about this, or if it&#8217;s even possible), and President <a href="http://uk.reuters.com/article/2013/08/16/uk-ecuador-oil-idUKBRE97F02L20130816">Correa&#8217;s proposal a few years ago</a> to stop all oil extraction if the rest of the world would collectively pay the value of half the oil in Yasuni. But, the rest of the world didn&#8217;t rally&#8230;</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>So these were the thoughts going through my head as I kept moving closer to Yasuni&#8230; no solutions, just more questions&#8230;</div>
<div></div>
<div>

I swear it&#8217;s real! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=765" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="765" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-12-2014-1154-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-12-2014-1154-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-12-2014-1154-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-12-2014-1154-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-12-2014-1154-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-12-2014-1154-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This was the nicest &#8220;secondary road&#8221;I think I&#8217;ve been on so far&#8230; if you look at the road sign, it asks you to remember that petroleum companies have put a X dollars into improving this community. These signs are pretty common. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=769" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="769" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1135-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1135-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1135-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1135-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1135-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1135-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The petro-burb project ends here for now, apparently&#8230; that&#8217;s the old road in the distance. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=770" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="770" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1148-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1148-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1148-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1148-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1148-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1148-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> We biked up the old road a ways and saw this hombre with his chainsaw&#8230; didn&#8217;t get a chance to talk with him, but how Captain Planet is this picture?? </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=771" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="771" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1155-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1155-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1155-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1155-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-13-2014-1155-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-13-2014-1155-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> New housing development along the new road. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=774" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="774" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-14-2014-222-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-14-2014-222-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-14-2014-222-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-14-2014-222-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-14-2014-222-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-14-2014-222-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Rainbow truck!!! Had to include this one&#8230; and rainbows here do not mean the same thing as rainbows where we live, my friends. There is a local election coming up, and each candidate has a flag. Supporters fly their candidates flag from their cars and houses&#8230; the rainbow flag is for a Kichwa candidate, since a checkered rainbow array is also a symbol of Andean culture here. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
</div>
<div>After I had been in Tena a few days, my self-imposed waiting time was over, and I had not heard from Chris or Taruka about going with either of them to Yasuni. So, I called Jhon, told him I was game, and that I&#8217;d be in Coca tomorrow, ready to take a motor canoe the next day. I met Jhon in Coca, the biggest port on the Napo river, and he was kind enough to let me store my bicycle and gear at his house while I spent 4 days in Yasuni.  The day I got there though, he wasn&#8217;t feeling well, so he said he would talk with a few other guide friends and see what he could do.  I got a little nervous at this point, but I had plenty of time if there was going to be another delay. I&#8217;ve also been here long enough to know that things were going to work out. When there&#8217;s work, people take it, and no one really plans much in advance. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span></div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>The new plan was that I would take a canoe all the way to Nuevo Rocafuerte (8 hrs away by motor canoe, near the Peruvian border) and start a 4 day visit from there, with a guy named Fernando who lives out there. This would be a trip into Yasuni with a naturalist, not to any community because no one lives in that part of Yasuni I would bring a few chickens for us to eat, since there aren&#8217;t chickens out there apparently. This is when things got awesome, and I&#8217;m grateful for all the serendipity and whatever that had to happen for me to end up camping in Yasuni with Fernando and his wife. It was literally a private amazon tour, just for me&#8230; for the price I had originally decided I wanted to pay.  Felt more like camping with some good friends, and less like some kind of arranged tour, can&#8217;t say enough about it.</div>
<div></div>
<div>

The guy in the pic is Jhon (the guide from coca who wasn&#8217;t feeling well enough to lead a trip), and in the box are 2 chickens so we could have a little culinary variety while camping. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=778" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="778" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1031-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1031-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1031-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1031-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1031-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1031-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The inside of the canoe&#8230; pretty comfy, actually! Because it&#8217;s a boat and has to be balanced, there was no center aisle, but rather a central zig-zag&#8230; every other row had 1 seat on the left, 2 on the right. The other rows had the opposite, so you had to wind your way up to the front to get off. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=777" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="777" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-910-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-910-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-910-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-910-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-910-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-910-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Leaving Coca&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=781" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="781" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-330-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-330-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-330-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-330-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-330-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-330-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The canoe made a bunch of stops along the way, to pick up and drop off people who live and visit the communities along the Rio Napo. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=782" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="782" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1222-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1222-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1222-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1222-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1222-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1222-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Big trucks on big barges&#8230; past a certain point going eastward, there are no roads and the river is the main transport conduit </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=783" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="783" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1224-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1224-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1224-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1224-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-1224-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-1224-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Community along the Napo </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=784" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="784" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-553-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-553-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-553-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-553-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Downtown Nuevo Rocafuerte on a wednesday night!! The river is just to the left of the picture. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=785" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="785" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-606-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-606-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-15-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-15-2014-606-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Nuevo Rocafuerte is about 10 min by canoe from the Peruvian border&#8230; you can take the Rio Napo all the way to Iquitos, and into the main Amazon river if you want. But first, you have to go through customs and immigration. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=786" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="786" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1017-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1017-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1017-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1017-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1017-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1017-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Loading up Fernando and his wife Leysa&#8217;s canoe for the camping trip. We&#8217;ll be gone 4 days, 3 nights and it&#8217;s just Fernando, Leysa, me, and their 10 year old nephew Richard. F and L live in N. Rocafuerte, but Richard and his sister and mom are in town visiting from Peru. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=788" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="788" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1026-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1026-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1026-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1026-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1026-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1026-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Meet Richard&#8230; this pic about sums up his 10-going-on-25 personality. A guy of few words, but nice and really helpful on the boat. This kid will be guiding your kids&#8217; visits to the Amazon in 15 years, folks&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=789" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="789" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1030-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1030-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1030-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1030-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> All our gear, as seen from the middle of the canoe. These c anoes are each 12 meters long and have canopies and side coverings for when it rains (and it did)&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=790" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="790" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1126-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1126-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1126-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1126-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1126-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1126-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> To get into the protected Yasuni park, you motor up to the peruvian border on the Rio Napo (but not across the border), and then take a right onto the Yasuni River, a smaller tributary. After about half hour, you enter the park. The water is a silty brown here on the Yasuni as it is on the Napo, from all the tanins and clay soil. The Napo is much more polluted though, because it&#8217;s the main transportation route, sewer, and industrial dump site in the area. The Yasuni flows into the Napo from inside the park. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=791" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="791" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1138-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1138-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Here&#8217;s a map of Yasuni, and there different areas that are inhabited by different groups (who had been living there before 1959 when the park officially came to be). We were heading to a lake on the farthest right side of the green area. No one lives in this area. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=792" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="792" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am1.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1138-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am1.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am1.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1138-am1.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1138-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> A zoomed-in view of where I was&#8230; the part that says &#8220;Lag. Jatuncocha&#8221; indicates the lake where we camped. You are not permitted to keep going much further on the Rio Yasuni because there are two indigenous groups known as &#8220;no contactados.&#8221;In other words, these are groups who have indicated that they wish to have no contact with the outside world and are not to be visited. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=793" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="793" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1247-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1247-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Arrived at Lake Jatuncocha, to an established campsite accessible by canoe. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px;
