height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=795" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="795" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm2.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1247-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm2.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm2.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-1247-pm2.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-1247-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Leysa setting up the kitchen&#8230; just like camping at home! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=821" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="821" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-549-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-549-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-549-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-549-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-549-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-549-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Laguna Jatuncocha&#8230; just to give you an idea of the vistas. The lake was like glass much of the time, and we spent lots of time motoring all around, looking for birds and critters through the binoculars. Binoculars for me&#8230; Fernando could see things I couldn&#8217;t even find WITH binocs&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=822" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="822" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-556-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-556-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-556-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-556-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-556-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-556-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> From my perch at the front of the canoe </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=796" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="796" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-109-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-109-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-109-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-109-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-109-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-109-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Back at the campsite, I found some cool bugs almost immediately! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=797" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="797" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-119-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-119-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-119-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-119-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-119-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-119-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And a lizard! This is most likely a plica plica (<a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plica_plica" rel="nofollow">http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plica_plica</a>), Thanks to Amanda T. for that ID! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=799" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="799" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-259-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-259-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-259-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-259-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-259-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-259-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> After setting up camp, we went fishing&#8230; for piranhas!! To catch them I had a long stick with a piece of line tied to the end, probably no more than 10 ft of line. To catch them, you have to violently splash the water with the rod tip, so they think something big and delicious fell in the water. For bait, we used chunks of beef. They bit almost immediately, and consistently&#8230; I eventually caught 2 but it was hard to get them outta the water before they chowed all the bait. Leysa caught 2 more, so there was one for each of us for dinner. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=800" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="800" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-301-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-301-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-301-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-301-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-301-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-301-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Looka&#8217;those choppers!!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=801" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="801" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-346-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-346-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-346-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-346-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-346-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-346-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Richard came fishing too&#8230; he didn&#8217;t catch one the first day, but I swear he had a rod in the water every time we were on the boat after that! By day 3 he caught dinner all on his own. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=803" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="803" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-730-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-730-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-730-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-730-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-730-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-730-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Leysa cooked up the fishies that night and they were delicious&#8230; fried with salt and lemon, with an avocado and plantains. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=808" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="808" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1034-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-1034-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1034-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1034-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1034-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-1034-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fernando had the awesome idea to save the teeth, and let the ants clean out all the remaining skin and flesh. His n&#8217; hers piranha teeth&#8230; awww, you know Ed can&#8217;t wait for this sweet present. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=804" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="804" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-742-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-742-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-742-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-742-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-16-2014-742-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-16-2014-742-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Dinner guest&#8230; a saltamonte en Espanol. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=805" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="805" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-729-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-729-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-729-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-729-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-729-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-729-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=809" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="809" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1255-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-1255-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1255-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1255-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-1255-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-1255-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Here&#8217;s another liana called &#8216;Escaleras de Diablo&#8217; or Devil&#8217;s stairway. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=806" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="806" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-814-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-814-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fernando with a macaw feather&#8230; the other side of the feather is blue! Fernando didn&#8217;t seem to like being in pictures (he never looked at the camera much), but I can&#8217;t say enough about this guy. He was professional but fun, and was always up for talking and answering questions about the forest and wildlife. If he didn&#8217;t know something, he said he didn&#8217;t know, but the guy knew just about everything I wanted to ask. Usually &#8220;hospitality&#8221; and &#8220;camping&#8221;don&#8217;t belong in the same sentence, but Fernando made it happen&#8230; down to drying off the canoe seat cushion whenever I got in the boat, he was all about every single detail. He brought the binoculars, the Ecuador bird ID book, and boots for walking in the mud. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=807" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="807" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am1.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-814-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am1.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am1.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-814-am1.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-814-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This dead tree is where a huge group of parrots congregates at about 7am every morning. The soil here is unusually mineral rich, and the parrots come here to chew and lick the minerals from the tree. Fernando told me that these areas of soil and subsequently of mineral-rich trees are rare, once every 100 hectares or so? So we got to see a big group of parrots one morning. My camera sucks for wildlife shots, which is why you don&#8217;t see any parrots here. <span class='wp-smiley wp-emoji wp-emoji-smile' title=':)'>:)</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=810" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="810" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-114-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-114-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-114-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-114-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-114-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-114-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Centipedes!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=811" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="811" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-122-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-122-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-122-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-122-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-122-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-122-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Here, fernando is chopping into the bark of a fallen tree, a special type of palmera with dark bark, where a certain type of beetle comes to lay its eggs. The beetle needs a dead tree, with some kind of existing scar on the bark. Three months after the beetle lays its eggs, you can cut into the bark and find&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=812" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="812" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-128-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-128-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-128-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-128-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-128-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-128-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These!! These are late-stage beetle larvae, or gusanos. Gusanos, it turns out, are delicious. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=813" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="813" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-313-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-313-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-313-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-313-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-313-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-313-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> So, we collected all the gusanos we could from that tree, and brought them back to Leysa where she took out their intestines so the fatty larvae could fry in their own grease along with some garlic and salt. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=815" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="815" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-735-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-735-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-735-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-735-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-735-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-735-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Pretty sure I ate most of the ones we collected&#8230; the fried final product is in the right-hand bowl. The heads were slightly crunchy, a nice juxtaposition of textures. #junglefoodsnob. Leysa did all the cooking and it was fantastic&#8230; espcially since she&#8217;s actually a professional nurse and is working with Francisco until her Ecuadorian work visa comes in (she is from Peru). It was fun to talk about diseases from someone who treats them in the rainforest. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=814" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="814" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-606-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-606-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-17-2014-606-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-17-2014-606-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This was the funniest bird I saw on the trip, and there were lots of them so I could get a few pictures. It&#8217;s called a Hoatzin, and it has been given its own genus and suborder since its evolutionary placement is still a bit mysterious. It is completely vegetarian, and uses bacterial fermentation in its crop (like cattle) to digest its food. Amazing. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=816" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="816" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-720-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-720-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-720-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-720-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-720-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-720-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> These ants have a symbiotic relationship with the stem of this plant, and if you didn&#8217;t know to look, you&#8217;d never guess the plant was full of ants. Incidentally, the ants taste like lemon&#8230; we ate a bunch. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=817" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="817" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-732-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-732-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-732-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-732-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-732-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-732-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Tree called &#8220;sangre de gallina&#8221;or blood of the chicken.. Kichwas use the red sap for medicinal purposes. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=819" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="819" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-714-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-714-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-714-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-714-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-714-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-714-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Tons of epiphytes all over&#8230; this was a particularly big and cool one. The tree and vines underneath support the growth of the leafy plant that doesn&#8217;t require soil. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=826" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="826" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-750-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-750-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-750-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-750-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-750-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-750-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The widest, tallest tree in this part of the Amazon&#8230; called the Saebo. I&#8217;m standing between two of its roots. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=825" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="825" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-748-am1.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-748-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-748-am1.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-748-am1.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-748-am1.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-748-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Looking straight up the Saebo tree from between the roots&#8230; </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=827" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="827" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-814-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-814-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-814-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-814-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-814-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-814-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> From the river, the Saebo is the tall round spreading crown in the pic. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=828" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="828" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1139-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1139-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1139-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1139-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1139-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1139-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Fernando is a pro canoe navigator&#8230; we went through some small streams that led out of the lake to find cool spots to walk around. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=829" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="829" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1238-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1238-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1238-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1238-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1238-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1238-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Little frog I found&#8230; Apparently these get very large and very delicious for the Kichwas who eat them. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=830" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="830" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1247-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1247-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-1247-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-1247-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This scalloped-looking tree is called &#8220;Remocaspi&#8221;, or Oar Tree in Kichwa. Each scallop in the tree is used to make an oar for a canoe. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=823" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="823" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-813-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-813-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-813-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-813-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-813-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-813-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> And for the final night of camping, we went out and looked for Caiman! (In case I forgot to mention, we did not swim in this lake&#8230;). Basically, you go out quietly in the canoe with a headlamp, and look for orange eyes that show when the light hits them. The caimans are a bit stunned by the light, so Fernando was able to pick one up right out of the water. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=824" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="824" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-815-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-815-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-815-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-815-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-18-2014-815-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-18-2014-815-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> This is a black caiman, pretty small about 3 years old. There are two other types that live in the lake and rivers here. </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=818" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="818" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-950-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-950-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-950-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-950-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-19-2014-950-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-19-2014-950-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> On the way out of Yasuni, we stopped at the border so I could say I had been to Peru. This sign says &#8220;Welcome to the republic of Ecuador.&#8221; After we got back to Rocafuerte, Fernando dropped me off at a hostel and went to reserve me a ticket for the motor canoe back to Coca the next morning. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
</div>
<div></div>
<div>Fernando and Leysa Sifuentes don&#8217;t have a website, and although they find visitors through a few different agencies, you may not get a particular guide if you book through an agency in Quito.  If you&#8217;re thinking of visiting Ecuador, or want to visit the Amazon with a naturalist guide in general, shoot Fernando an email at sifuentes.fede@gmail.com.  Or email me for his cell phone number&#8230; much faster way to get ahold of people here!</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>In the end, I think my experiment worked (although I didn&#8217;t do a control so we&#8217;ll never know).  I didn&#8217;t book early, and I had a great experience.  I learned that while some things here you can just show up and do, other things take a bit more time, and often you have no idea what kind of experience you&#8217;re getting yourself into, even if you think you have it down.  I&#8217;m not sure I&#8217;ll ever have the chance to bum around for almost 2 weeks waiting to set up &#8220;my perfect trip&#8221; like this again, so in the future I think I&#8217;ll spend more time and energy in advance, looking for referrals and references from other people, like the one I&#8217;ve just written here.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>After the long canoe ride back to Coca, I spent a few days in that town doing some work on the internet&#8230; I came back to a bunch of required paperwork for my new postdoc at CDC. I also got to edit the proofs of our manuscript that will be published soon&#8230; overall, pretty good reasons to spend a few days in a sweaty internet cafe.  I left Coca by bus, just to get me up a couple thousand meters before I started biking back toward Quito.  I stopped in a little village called Papallacta, and enjoyed an evening at a hot spring and some trout for dinner. Of all the different Ecoregions in Ecuador, I think I like the Andes the most for cycling.</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div>I&#8217;m now in Tumbaco, a suburb of Quito, preparing to leave Ecuador next week.  I&#8217;m staying at a Casa de Ciclistas&#8230; essentially the home of a wonderfully kind guy named Santiago, and his family. Santiago runs a business reparing high-end mountain bikes out of his house, and he has a place for wanderers with bikes to stop, rest and camp&#8230; accommodations are sparse, but it&#8217;s great to spend time with other cyclists, and Santiago and his family are saints for having random strangers around all the time. They don&#8217;t charge for staying as long as you like, but contributing some cash for the water and electric bill is definitely a good idea. If you&#8217;re in Ecuador and looking for this place, email me for Santiago&#8217;s phone number. It&#8217;s apparently googleable too, but I wasn&#8217;t able to find it easily.</div>
<div></div>
<div>

Ilde made me breakfast, and Jorge offered to drive me up to the top of the pass (About 4000 meters), but I said no thanks I gotta ride! </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=832" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="832" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-920-am.jpg" data-orig-size="768,1024" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-24-2014-920-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-920-am.jpg?w=225" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-920-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-920-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-24-2014-920-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Ride I did&#8230; almost 4 hrs straight up, and then straight down to Tumbaco. Before leaving Papallacta, I stopped for some air in my tires and a few guys in a public works truck gave me this flower. How nice! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=833" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="833" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-1014-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-24-2014-1014-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-1014-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-1014-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-24-2014-1014-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-24-2014-1014-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> it&#8217;s always nice to look back at where you&#8217;ve been, every so often&#8230; I rode up from just next to that lake. And this was not even the top!! </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=834" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="834" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-928-am.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-928-AM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-928-am.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-928-am.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-928-am.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-928-AM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Made it to Tumbaco, to the Casa de Ciclistas! Santiago is next to me, along with Alle and Irene, a couple from Holland. </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-row" style="width: 479px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="479" data-original-height="159" > <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=837" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="837" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-1226-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-1226-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-1226-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-1226-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-1226-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-1226-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> Another view from the ride on the MTB burke gilman trail in Tumbaco </div> </div> </div> <div class="gallery-group" style="width: 159px; height: 159px;" data-original-width="159" data-original-height="159" > <div class="tiled-gallery-item"> <a href="https://karlynsandiego.wordpress.com/?attachment_id=838" border="0"> <img data-attachment-id="838" data-orig-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-457-pm.jpg" data-orig-size="1024,768" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-457-PM.jpg" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-457-pm.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-457-pm.jpg?w=479" src="https://karlynsandiego.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/wpid-photo-jan-26-2014-457-pm.jpg?w=155&#038;h=155&#038;crop=1" width="155" height="155" data-original-width="155" data-original-height="155" title="wpid-Photo-Jan-26-2014-457-PM.jpg" alt="" style="width: 155px; height: 155px;" /> </a> <div class="tiled-gallery-caption"> The digs for ciclistas at Santiago&#8217;s&#8230; the toilet is on the left, sink in themiddle, and shower on the right. Oh and all my laundry hanging up in front&#8230; </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
</div>
<div></div>
<div>So here I am, counting down the days til my flight on Feb 4th to Manila. I realized too that the Bonderman is almost exactly half over&#8230; the 4 month mark is February 2nd.  I&#8217;m excited, but sad to be leaving at the same time, and a little scared to be going to countries where I speak none of the language.  This is definitely the longest post yet, and probably/hopefully you won&#8217;t see another one this long again!  It has been fantastic to spend so long in S. America and to take things as fast or slow as I&#8217;ve wanted. I get the sense that this will definitely seem luxurious over the next 4 months, when I&#8217;ll be visiting 4 or 5 different countries and flying with the bike more often. We&#8217;ll see what happens&#8230; the itinerary up next is Philippines, Vietnam-Cambodia-Thailand whirlwind, South India, and finally Turkey.  Next post will be from the eastern hemisphere!</div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
<div></div>
